The ArmRestor fits in all vehicle types, providing an easy attachment between the window and weather stripping without any obstruction to your vehicle. The material used for the device is High grade scratch resistant plastic- avoiding damage to the window or the interior of your vehicle. The plastic material can withstand different temperature conditions keeping the longevity of your device.                                      SLEEK, SLENDER, & ELEGANT



                                                              






 
1. Comfort in all weather conditions 

 Nice! but without Armrestor, it is not comfy.
We all spend a lot of time on the road, if you don't sit right, you will notice the small discomforts of the low back, upper back, shoulders, and neck. Leaning against the door will hurt your back in a long run. The air cushioned slidable armrest pad allows you to rest your arm in a more comfortable fashion, thereby giving your body a more relaxed resting position, removing the restless feeling of driving.

                       

                       Raining? You can still enjoy ArmRestor with the window closed!You do not have to wait for a sunny day for a good ride. You can enjoy your ride in a rainy day too!     Even in a small car such as a Cooper (above and below Pic)
2. Safety- Keep your eyes on the road.

          You do not have to reach out to your glove box or the center armrest to get tissues and coins. ArmRestor is in your eyesight and will help you to keep your eyes on the road.
3. Convenience- One central location for your stuff

                       Tissue Dispenser, Coins Dispenser, and Bottle/Phone Holder. You can get a simple upgrade in your car with Armrestor.
4. Easy to use and Tool-less installation
It will take less than a minute to install ArmRestor to your car without any tool. That's right, no tool! A 2 step process. The ArmRestor lip slips into any area on your door panel between the weather stripping & window in an open or closed position. Position the hook and slide in the main body-that is it.

                 


ArmRestor
Deluxe in Black or Creme with a custom hand stitched cloth with                                                            embossed logo                                                            Black with black pad or Creme with dark brown pad
       





 
PAD ADJUSTMENT:

       
The ArmRestor can be fitted along any area of your door panel. The slid-able cushion pad helps to avoid any objects on the door panel without sacrificing the comfort of arm resting. By slightly pressing the release button located in the center of the pad, the pad can slide easily with slight pressure: the pad will move along the base and lock in various preset intervals by releasing the button. The pad can be removed from the uni-body base unit for cleaning purposes. The pad has a slid-able capacity area of about 4-5 inches out from the base ends. 

Hook Adjustment:The universal hook attachment has a unique patented mechanism that allows the expanding and contraction of the hook, permitting the ArmRestor to fit on all vehicle types.>>>insert the video here>>>

Tissue Compartment:

                                                Work flawlessly with Napkins or Pocket Size Tissue

                    

The tissue dispenser holds large household tissues or standard size Kleenex tissues purchased at any shopping grocery center. In the back of device, simply insert the tissues in the center of the inner backside lip. Pull out one tissue to have the tissue exposed through the tissue lip for easy dispensing.
Coin Dispenser:

                   

                   
Holds your quarters, nickels and dimes. Simply insert your coins into the proper coin chambers (Q,N,D) from the front: the puck attaches to a spring, securely holding your coins for disbursement. Removing a coin is simple, just place your finger under the mouth opening and slide the coin out. 
Detachable Bottle/Phone HOLDER:

                 

      
     
                                       
This awesome feature allows you to move the cup to either side tray located at the end of the device. Simply push down the button feature located on the arm base of the cup holder, slide out the cup holder from the tray. To place the cup holder on either side of the unit: simply press down the button feature located on the arm base, and snap the cup holder into the aperture located within the tray.
The bottle holder allows swivel action to accommodate the end user comfort by just moving the bottle holder in a 270-degree fashion with preset locking positions. The ergonomically designed cup holder allows for standard Industry bottles,  cans and Styrofoam cups. The cup holder will tightly hold any drink into position while driving.
The swivel action allows cell phone to be at your fingertips for easy access. Avoid Cell Phone Tickets- or get road side distractions. The cell phone holder allows you to have direct access to your cell phone right where you need it, near your body for easy hearing and one touch finger action.

                 CUP HOLDER HAS MANY USES:
         Hot cups, Sweaty bottles-no more. Protective rim and grip handle

                                                                   Portable-detachable ANYTIME, ANYWHERE

                                      

                   PAD HEIGHT ADJUSTMENT

                           
The ArmRestor has the capability to incline the pad to your comfort level. Now you can have the pad up high or down low!!!! If  the pad is to high for your comfort, simply either raise your seat to accommodate the use of the ArmRestor's pad or lower the pad by pressing the adjustable hook to incline the unit. Caveat: ensure not to incline more then the 2nd or 3rd preposition lock, for a more secure fit and ensure the cup holder is not in use.


****************************************************************************

                    2 types of Custom Stickers





      

 

If funding goals are not 100 achieved but are close to our  60%goal, we can still move forward as we have a potential secured debt financing from a banking institution that will provide the financial backing to match our goal.If  our funding goal  is less than 60% , management team has decided that all funds will be refunded and debt financing will be sought and renegotiated with the bank that sought interest in assisting. 









Questions and Answers:
Q: I have a big truck, small car, or SUV-will ArmRestor fit it? 
A: ArmRestor was made to fit all vehicles types. The hook mechanism expands to allow a universal fit.  The ArmRestor also fits vertically perfect on the interior door pane for a snug fit since the dimensions are standardized in all vehicles between the vertical X axis .
Q: Does the ArmRestor need any adhesives, screws, or other attaching elements? 
A: No, the ArmRestor device was developed and patented to allow the unit to station on your door panel without the use of these tools or attachment materials. The lip adjustment allows the device to fit securely & comfortable along any door panel. 
Q: Will ArmRestor be intrusive on the side airbags?
A: NO! , the hook mechanism that holds the body's mainframe will give way upon the pressure of the air bag opening if one happens to be in the general area where the ArmRestor is placed, thereby giving the cover to release upon the air bag dispensing. Also it actually happens to be a protectorant in that many covers of the door fly outwardly upon the bag being pressurized and released. This keeps the panel from flying out into the person while the airbag commonly disperses from the bottom upward where it is stored. The ArmRestor does not cover the lower extremities of the cover or where the airbag dispenses from.! 
Q: What type of leather ArmRestor is using?
A: Synthetic leather- it is made with high-grade vinyl which is tough and durable, easy to clean and maintain.
Q: Will the ArmRestor look or appear to fit smoothly or look right? 
A: Yes, the patented features and ergonomic design fits smoothly on the door panel. The adjustable lip will allow the ArmRestor to press tightly along the door panel for a tight and smooth fit without the lumbered appearance. 
Q: Is the ArmRestor permanently positioned on the door panel? 
A: NO, it is your choice to leave it there permanently or not. The device is portable and the adjustment mechanisms allow you to easily remove it, reposition it, or replace it back on your door panel. 
Q: Can the ArmRestor Device only be on the driver’s side door panel? 
A: No, the device was designed & patented to be used as a reversible Armrest and can be used on any one of your door panels. The bottle holder positions on each side of the Device, allowing the bottle tray removed and positioned on either side. This will allow the bottle tray to position in the front. 
Q: Can you place the bottle holder on the back end of the Device? 
A: Yes, the bottle holder has two positions, one on each end. It is up to the owner to use it to their best intentions. We recommend having the bottle holder rest in the front side for easy access while driving. For passenger use, the bottle holder can be in either position. 
Q: Will the Lip scratch the window? 
A: No, the material used is plastic. The ergonomically developed Lip avoids the back end from rubbing against your window. 
Q: What material is ArmRestor using?
A: The ArmRestor is made of automotive friendly plastics with UV stabilizers and is scratch resistant.
Q: Will a drink spill while driving? 
A: No, the design of the bottle holder and unit will withstand road bumps, so it acts as a shock absorber. Your bottle of water will be safe. 
Q: Will the drink come out of the bottle holder if I slam the door? 
A: It is intended for water bottle, so it will be fine. Let's not slam your door, bad for your car!
Installation instructions
1) Place the ArmRestor in an area along the door panel where it avoids any intrusion of your door latch or door LIP release knob.
2) The best option of inserting the lip of the hook, is to have your window rolled down completely and in some cases, to leave the window slightly visible, then locate the lip between the window and area of your weather stripping, then roll the window up to ensure it is attached properly.
3) The device will comfortably stay in position by simply pressing the body of the ArmRestor against the side of the inside door panel, first by pressing in the hook release button located on the top side of the hook area device: Adjust the hook according to the depth of your door panel. This will ensure the device properly secures against the door base by allowing the adjustable hook attachment to adjust to the depth or thickness of your door panel & allow the device to stay in position with the window open or closed, without coming off.
NOTES: 
- Allow the positioning of the ArmRestor along the door panel to avoid interference with the steering wheel, so that you have the most comfortable positioning of the Device. The slidable pad allows you to use the device as close or far from you since the pad feature moves along the base. 
- Be diligent where you place the device on the door panel so to avoid the objects that may be on your door panel such as the handle to open the door or the doorknob. 
- Before closing or slamming your car door, be sure to remove any drinking cup from the bottle- holder that does not have a lid cover, as precaution, so to avoid the cup from potentially spilling out any liquid. 
- Be cautious of drinking hot items placed in your bottle holder as you may unintentionally hit the cup while driving and may burn your hand or leg. Place water bottle only in the bottle holder in the appropriate position.
Disclaimers:
➢Allow the positioning of the ArmRestor along the door panel to avoid interference with the steering wheel, so that you have the most comfortable positioning of the Device. The slidable pad allows you to use the device as close or far from you since the pad feature moves along the base.
➢ Be diligent where you place the device on the door panel so to avoid the objects that may be on your door panel such as the handle to open the door or the doorknob.
➢ Before closing or slamming your car door, be sure to remove any drinking cup from the cup-holder that does not have a lid cover, as precaution, so to avoid the cup from potentially spilling out any liquid.
➢ Be cautious of drinking hot items placed in your cup holder as you may unintentionally hit the cup while driving and may burn your hand or leg. Place the cup holder in the appropriate position.


Project Creator

Nova Creations genesis was in part due to myself, Rob Nova with an entrepreneurial spirit. I converged my design ideas and paired up with an engineering professor to bring this product to life. I began my journey in financial analysis, studying and toggling with creating products that are consumer useful. My knowledge of manufacturing was broadened by my endeavor as a controller of a manufacturing operations-giving rise to my dreams of manufacturing. Many conceptual ideas I have created for eventual introduction in areas of housewares, stationary goods, Aftermarket.... My first success begins with the ArmRestor.

The ArmRestor is a product that aids all drivers and passengers with functionality that today's vehicles lack. This lack of amenities gave rise to my passion to introduce to the market a unique vehicle accessory and arm rest, allowing safety, convenience, and medicinal options.

Supporters are an immense part of the project not only to see the vision come to life through their financial support but through their on-going interest in seeing this through, making it a joint venture.

Risks & Challenges
It took me many years and more than 30 revisions to design and perfect the ArmRestor. I had spent most of our time in the main body design starting with multi-components to the unibody design. Our concern was mainly the durability of the product. The snap-in features were the most critical parts of our design process. We made several prototypes for initial testing. The supplier liked my ideas and agreed to start the mold for real product testing. I have been using the real product for strength and temperature testing rather than the ONLY one expensive and weak 3D printed prototype. The supplier has helped us to troubleshoot and perfect the product to the final stage where we are now.
My supplier is an injection molding company located in China. It has over 20 years of experience and a complete quality management systems including ISO9001 and ISO14001. The good news is the tooling is done. Your pledges will help cover remaining of the tooling cost and MOQ (minimum order quantity), as well as packaging and shipping. I will ship ArmRestor rewards to backers by the end of 2015, so you will be ready for your road trip in the Summer!Your support comes in many ways not only financial but to help me get the word out. This link is a share link that combines Pinterest, Facebook and Twitter in one single button, automatically adding our link to your social media. This would be a great wahoo.

story:
The Future of Water
Conservation Begins Here!

REFLOW G2RS ECO BENEFITS


A GLOBAL FRESHWATER CRISIS................... Today? 

YES & PREDICTED EVEN WORSE FOR TOMORROW! 


PERKS FOR SAVING OUR FRESHWATER



Click to See the ReFlow
In-Depth Up Close!


             WHY $50K is NEEDED? 

THE NEXT STEP TO MARKET IS PRODUCING TECHNICAL DESIGN DRAWINGS FOR MASS PRODUCTION OF SYSTEM @ $50,000.00 USD

With your help we can implement this new technology and immediately begin saving up to 30% of our household freshwater consumption.


                          A FIVE YEAR JOURNEY....

Today, we are asking for your help in finally bringing the ReFlow to Market - and start saving our depleting freshwater immediately...The return of saving up to 30% of our freshwater consumption in every household is well worth the effort in achieving. 


                         RISKS & CHALLENGES

The real risk we face is the possibility of not relaying the necessity for action today or people not understanding the genuinely dire need for us to make concerted efforts to turn our freshwater management around.

The implementation of this system can make a significant difference, reducing our freshwater consumption by as much as 30 percent immediately after installation, and without changing our social habits. In the state of California alone, the ReFlow can save 203 million gallons, daily. That is enough drinking water for 1.1 million people every day being wasted in our toilets. This innovative system can turn that around right away. 

The highest hurdles have been overcome already in terms first level prototypes' design, production, and proof of concept. There are no real or significant challenges and/or risks in completing this project and conserving our planet's number one resource. 

The same as other projects of this nature and size, we've face logistical challenges at all stages from development to coordinating delivery. There are potential risks as well including delays in delivering considering we have the certification process to complete before mass production; however, we have planned for November delivery of the system to supporters allowing ourselves plenty more buffer time than we see needed to get all our ducks in a row. 

I think challenges emerge to show us just how important something is. Regardless, I have the backing of an incredible team and we are committed to overcoming any/all unforeseen challenges within introducing this freshwater saving device to 400 homes within our first production run - with your help. 

Undoubtedly we can turn our freshwater management practice around with the right approach and tools, like the ReFlow G2RS. 

We thank you for caring and sharing with anyone you may know who needs water to survive. 

The ReFlow G2RS Final Design Model  

 

Yes, you can install the ReFlow with one
screw-driver, and in under one hour!

story:
UPDATE: Every contribution of $50 or more made on August 4, 2015 will ALSO receive a special rainbow bundle of seven fat quarters!! This campaign has been the pot of gold at the end of our rainbow and we want to THANK YOU!


**Don't forget to click on the image above to watch our awesome little video!**

What is Cherrywood?

We are a small hand-dyed fabric business in Brainerd, Minnesota, that has a BIG following in the quilting world.  Our claim to fame is our luscious "suede look", our amazing solid colors bundled together in gradations, and our high quality. 

(If you want to know more about us, keep scrolling through to the end!)

What do we need?

We desperately need a new building.  Cherrywood Hand Dyed Fabric is taking a long overdue step. We are trying to move forward, but have reached capacity in our current building. 

UPDATE: We have found a building!

It is in great condition and will need very little remodel! A bank loan has been secured for the purchase of the building.  We are also using personal finances and waiting to hear if we will receive a grant from the Initiative Foundation. 

**To celebrate, we have added new perks below - check it out! There are some gorgeous quilts, table runners and placemats up for grabs!**

Your donations will be used for the remodeling costs. The list includes:

  • installing customized streamline plumbing to accommodate many washing machines, with potential to double the number of machines.

  • wall construction to separate three work areas: messy (dyeing), somewhat messy (processing), and clean (office and design)
  • ventilation and fans to control dust particles and lint to keep our lungs healthy
  • purchasing new equipment such as washing machines, dryers, and cutting tables
We hope to begin construction mid August, and move in the new space this fall before our heavy travel season begins.  Your donation towards the build-out will help us move faster and make this a reality!

What happens if we surpass our goal?  Well, we have identified two stretch goals for ourselves that will increase our efficiency even more:

  • purchase another mangle for $2000
  • hire a general manager so that Karla can focus on the creative side of the business


Why do we need it?

Our working conditions are working against us. 

The current location of Cherrywood was meant to be temporary. Thanks to our devoted fans, we have flourished and ended up staying longer than planned. 

However, the old, multi-level building has many obstacles:

Dyeing process takes place in a small basement • Extreme high humidity that affects the dyes and sometimes causes us to shut down production • Lack of air conditioning • Old pipes  crumbling from tree roots • Continual floor drain back up •   Lack of proper space in dye "room" causing us to stack buckets of dye making them hard to access •  Absolutely no space to expand production •  Lack of storage for all materials under one roof • Lack of loading dock • Lack of personal work spaces •  Inefficient work flow • Two flights of stairs forcing us to haul fabric rolls,  10 lb. dye buckets, 5 gallon Synthrapol buckets, 50 pound bags of soda ash,  wet bins of fabric, and finished inventory by hand… 

Our employees' needs are pretty basic: safe, efficient working conditions… rolling carts instead of aching muscles. 

How can we stop working against our environment and make it work for us? With the purchase of a new building! 

YOU can help us get to the NEXT LEVEL---

ONE LEVEL!

We have plans for a building that will allow us to be more efficient in so many ways:  

- We will be able to handle our production with MUCH more efficiency and even increase to meet our growing demand. 

- A better workflow means handling the product fewer times, increasing efficiency.  We can move materials with rolling carts instead of our backs. This will allow us to keep our labor-intense product at an affordable price.

- With increased efficiency, Karla hopes to find more time for designing new patterns, formulating new gradations and developing new projects like the hugely successful "WICKED Challenge". 

- Dorothy will be able to nurture and grow our wholesale division, which gets Cherrywood closer to YOU through your local quilt shop. We have not been able to take on many wholesale orders because of our physical limitations. 

- Our shipping department can be just that - an actual department separated from the general work areas. This delivers Cherrywood to YOU faster! 

- We would love to accommodate tours and groups that we have had to turn away in the past. We are also dreaming about a sewing and education space to teach customers how to cut into their beloved stash! 

 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We can't express our gratitude enough for your donations. But we can give you our un-DYEing love - 

(Remember: you can donate in ANY amount, but here are some PERKS we offer)




















More about Cherrywood...

Who are our customers? Quilters, Fiber Artists, Garment Makers, Sewers, Seamstresses, Crafters, Doll Makers, Interior Designers, you get the picture…

What do we make?  We dye solid cotton fabric. That's all we do, and we do it well!  Our special "suede" technique has been perfected over our 30 years in business.  

What do we mean by “solids?” If you walk into a quilt shop or fabric store, you will see an amazing array of beautiful designs, prints and textures on bolts of fabric. Gorgeous? Yes. Overwhelming? Maybe. At Cherrywood, we have proven that solid colors can be just as powerful as an array of patterns and prints. When you let the COLOR of the fabric do all the heavy lifting, the DESIGN is what rises to the top. The eye is not distracted by printed images in the fabric. But even better is how well Cherrywood plays with other fabrics. It is very welcoming, polite, complementary and makes those prints look good. Everything a good friend should be!


So, big deal - there’s tons of plain colored fabric out there, right?  

What makes Cherrywood so special? We start with a high-quality 100% cotton unbleached muslin. Then, we use our secret formulas, procion dyes, and proprietary technique to create a fabric so soft- so organic - so “broken-in” - that you gotta feel it to believe it!  The dyeing process, including two hot water rinse cycles, results in an extremely high thread count. (This is important, for those keeping track.) The gentle 'mottling' creates a tone-on-tone texture that gives these solid fabrics an amazing depth and richness.  It actually looks like suede!  Even non-quilters feel the need to touch it.

That's the official answer to "Oh my gosh, how do you get this to feel so fabulous?"  But it just may also have something to do with the fact that our team of experts has touched it countless times before it comes to you.

Who is Cherrywood?  

Cherrywood is: Karla Overland, owner of Cherrywood. I am a Designer and am addicted to designing everything - color gradations, fabrics, quilts, patterns, websites, and graphics. 


Cherrywood is: Dorothy Cronin, my right-hand woman. She is passionate about what she does and puts her nose to the grindstone until a job is complete. She coordinates all our trade shows and handles the wholesale accounts.


Cherrywood is: Melissa Yeager, our newest addition. She gets your mail orders sent to you in the blink of an eye and is the contact person for our WICKED Challenge logistics.


Cherrywood is: Arlo Hill, Darla Grotzke and Lorrene Maroney - the “Cherrywood Manglers,” a.k.a. Pressing and Packaging Engineers, a.k.a. the women who take piles and piles of wet fabric and magically turn it into those perfectly folded bundles you can't resist.


Cherrywood is: “showgirls!” It’s not what you think, but it is still a pretty kickin' job. We need extra helpers at the 10 national quilt shows we go to, and this gives me an opportunity to bring along trusted friends, colleagues and even my sisters Brenda and Stacy. 

Cherrywood is also YOU - our customers, our supporters, our cheerleaders, our creative muses, our family, our friends. Many of you have been Cherrywood fans since the beginning 30 years ago and have watched us evolve. 

Your feedback is crucial to us. 

Your ideas are inspiring to us. 

Your compliments are humbling to us.

And now, your donations make you part of us. 

THANK YOU! THANK YOU!

Each step gets us closer to making 8-steps easier.  (Did that make sense??)

Then, we use our secret formulas, procion dyes, and proprietary technique to create a fabric so soft- so organic - so “broken-in” - that you gotta feel it to believe it!  The dyeing process, including two hot water rinse cycles, results in an extremely high thread count. (This is important, for those keeping track.) The gentle 'mottling' creates a tone-on-tone texture that gives these solid fabrics an amazing depth and richness.  It actually looks like suede!  Even non-quilters feel the need to touch it.
That's the official answer to "Oh my gosh, how do you get this to feel so fabulous?"  But it just may also have something to do with the fact that our team of experts has touched it countless times before it comes to you.
Who is Cherrywood?  
Cherrywood is: Karla Overland, owner of Cherrywood. I am a Designer and am addicted to designing everything - color gradations, fabrics, quilts, patterns, websites, and graphics. 

Cherrywood is: Dorothy Cronin, my right-hand woman. She is passionate about what she does and puts her nose to the grindstone until a job is complete. She coordinates all our trade shows and handles the wholesale accounts.

Cherrywood is: Melissa Yeager, our newest addition. She gets your mail orders sent to you in the blink of an eye and is the contact person for our WICKED Challenge logistics.

Cherrywood is: Arlo Hill, Darla Grotzke and Lorrene Maroney - the “Cherrywood Manglers,” a.k.a. Pressing and Packaging Engineers, a.k.a. the women who take piles and piles of wet fabric and magically turn it into those perfectly folded bundles you can't resist.

Cherrywood is: “showgirls!” It’s not what you think, but it is still a pretty kickin' job. We need extra helpers at the 10 national quilt shows we go to, and this gives me an opportunity to bring along trusted friends, colleagues and even my sisters Brenda and Stacy. 
Cherrywood is also YOU - our customers, our supporters, our cheerleaders, our creative muses, our family, our friends. Many of you have been Cherrywood fans since the beginning 30 years ago and have watched us evolve. 
Your feedback is crucial to us. 
Your ideas are inspiring to us. 
Your compliments are humbling to us.
And now, your donations make you part of us. 



THANK YOU! THANK YOU!
Each step gets us closer to making 8-steps easier.  (Did that make sense??)

story:
Kiwanis is a global organization of volunteers dedicated to improving the world, one child and one community at a time.

The Northport / East Northport Kiwanis club supports scholarships for the Northport High School, the food pantry, Long Island Cares, Northport Historical Society, Guide Dog Foundation, Kiwanis International Foundation, St. Vincent DePaul Society, Northport East Northport Community Theatre, Northport Arts Coalition, St. Baldrick Day, Kiwanis Pediatric Trauma Unit, Make a Wish Foundation, Northport Tigerettes, L.I. 2 Day Breast Cancer walk, Angels for Warriors, Mothers Against Drunk Drivers, Viscardi Center, Stony Brook Hospital, Cow Harbor Warriors, Relay for Life, 4-K for Cancer, Erika Josephine Foundation, US Michael Murphy Commissioning, New Ground Inc., Hoops of Northport, Navy Sea Cadets, New Babies in Need, Northport PBA and more…..

The Club Meets every Wednesday at the Northport Yacht Club - Bluff Point Rd - 12 Noon

The Objects of Kiwanis

Object 1: To give primacy to the human and spiritual rather than to the material values of life.

Object 2: To encourage the daily living of the Golden Rule in all human relationships.

Object 3: To promote the adoption and the application of higher social, business, and professional standards.

Object 4: To develop, by precept and example, a more intelligent, aggressive, and serviceable citizenship.

Object 5: To provide, through Kiwanis clubs, a practical means to form enduring friendships, to render altruistic service, and to build better communities.

Object 6: To cooperate in creating and maintaining that sound public opinion and high idealism which make possible the increase of righteousness, justice, patriotism, and goodwill.

Please call Jim McKenna at (631) 974-9153 if you have any questions or if you would like to join

Thank you for your support.

story:
I am honored, touched and so appreciative of all of you who contributed to the Beautiful Butterfly campaign. You are making it happen! I thank God for each of you. (I wish I could come through the screen and give you a BIG HUG!) 

There is hope for the hopeless and love for those who feel like no one cares. YOU care! And women and girls around this world are going to feel that love as we embark on this great journey. 

We are moving full steam ahead with bringing Beautiful Butterfly to life. We couldn't have done it without YOU! Thank you and welcome to the Beautiful Butterfly family. 

The #1 question I’ve received to date is “I missed the deadline, can I still contribute?” The answer: Absolutely! The Indiegogo campaign has ended, however we’re going to set up a contribution page on the beautifulbutterfly.org website. We’ll let you know when it’s up and ready. 

Keep letting your light shine and spreading the word! Beautiful Butterfly is on the way! Love you bunches!!!


Who We Are

Beautiful Butterfly is an apparel and accessories company with a 3-part focus: 

Celebrate, Cultivate and Rescue

Our goal is to empower and equip you to Celebrate the beauty within...Cultivate beauty in others... and Rescue the captives.


CELEBRATE THE BEAUTY WITHIN 

Mass media has created a definition of beauty that’s based on superficial things such as make-up, how long your hair is, the color of your skin, and your body figure. The truth is – You don’t have to be a super model to look and feel beautiful. You’re beautiful because God made you.

I once heard it said, “If you are surrounded by beautiful things and wonderful teachers who inspire you, it brings out the beauty within you.”

CULTIVATE BEAUTY IN OTHERS

We all have someone we can inspire (whether it be a friend, sister, aunt, mom, niece, daughter, cousin, grandmother, co-worker, mentor or neighbor). Through Beautiful Butterfly apparel and accessories, you can let the women in your life know you think they’re beautiful and their life is valuable and worth celebrating. Not just on birthdays, holidays and special occasions, but any day and everyday. 

RESCUE THE CAPTIVES 

When you purchase from Beautiful Butterfly to celebrate yourself and cultivate beauty in someone else, you are also helping to set captives free. With every purchase you make, part of the proceeds will go towards organizations that are in the trenches combatting human trafficking and sexual abuse.


Together We Can Impact The World

Your contributions and support will help us officially launch Beautiful Butterfly. Together, we can light up a dark world, and inspire hope and encouragement to those at home and abroad. 



Together We Can Impact The World

Your contributions and support will help us officially launch Beautiful Butterfly. Together, we can light up a dark world, and inspire hope and encouragement to those at home and abroad. 


A Few Special Notes 

The Beautiful Tee is our classic tee, representing being a light in the midst of darkness. This tee is a black cotton tee with silver specks. Soft to the touch and soft on the skin, the Beautiful Tee is made of 97% cotton and 3% lurex. 

The Beautiful Tee comes in a scoop neck and v-neck style. Once you've selected your perk, you'll receive a follow-up email to confirm your preferred t-shirt style and size. Sizes range from small to 4xl. 

We are currently shipping to the US only. 


We will continue to expand the Beautiful Butterfly brand to bring you even more beautiful products to fill your life with beautiful things that inspire you! 

Funds from this campaign will be used to acquire the following: 

  • Hotronix Heat Press 
  • Interchangeable Heat Platens
  • Graphtek Cutting Plotter
  • Cap Press 
  • Heat transfer paper, materials and supplies
  • Shipping and packing supplies


Special Thanks

To the heroes behind the scenes! You make the rest of us look good. I celebrate your God-given gifts and your entrepreneurial spirit that brightens this world. 

PHOTOGRAPHY provided by Behind The Kamera

MAKE-UP provided by The Beauty Mentor

VIDEOGRAPHY AND EDITING provided by T.Benjamin Productions


I often say "teamwork makes the dream work." Just like it took a crew to make this campaign possible, it takes individuals like you and me, working together, to create the change we want to see. Your support makes all the difference. I invite you to join me on this quest to make life beautiful! 


FAQ

How do I select a tee shirt size? 

A: Once you select your perk and make your contribution, you’ll receive a follow-up email to choose your preferred tee shirt style and size. 

What tee shirt sizes do you carry?

A: Great question! Sizes range from small to 4XL. We leave no woman behind. You’re beautiful!

What if I don’t know the tee shirt size of the person I want to get a shirt for?

A: No shirt size? No problem. Go ahead and select your perk and submit your contribution. You’ll receive a follow-up email to choose your preferred tee shirt style and size. You’ll have plenty of time to send a message to the person to find out her tee shirt size. 

A lot of the perks come with something called Beautiful Notecards. What are Beautiful Notecards? 

A: I’m glad you asked. The Beautiful Notecards have a beautiful design on the outside and are blank on the inside for you to write a personalized note. Use these cards anytime you want to brighten someone’s day. 

How do I add shipping? 

A: Go to the head of the class! You are on a roll with such wonderful questions. When you click the Contribute button, you’ll see an option to add an “Additional Gift”. Click on “Custom” and type in the shipping amount. This amount will be added to the Contribution amount you entered. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Your voice counts! Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word about Beautiful Butterfly. Let's light up the world!

story:
We're all just chronically sore all of the time. Sometimes we can barely speak.

Laryngopharyngeal Reflux (LPR) is a chronic, life changing disease that involves damaging contents from the stomach whooshing upwards past the oesophagus to damage the voicebox, mouth and nose. There is no evidence based cure and symptomatic treatment is often unsuccessful. It is not a lifestyle disease and it affects all people, even those who are perilously thin. LPR is thought to be a risk factor for the development of laryngeal cancer.

We are seeking funding to set up a support site for this condition and to campaign for improved recognition and treatment of this difficult disease.

Our key aims are as follows:

  1. To provide evidence based information about LPR and Extra-Oesophageal (EOR) disease. Where conflicting theories exist, to provide details of both.
  2. To provide information about investigations, therapies and procedures that may be of benefit, giving the reader an immediate sense of the strength of the supporting evidence for each
  3. To act as an internet focal point for LPR / EOR sufferers
  4. To campaign for improved recognition and treatment of LPR/EOR
  5. To achieve funding for long-term goals

In the longer term, we hope to be in a position to achieve charitable status and support distinct research on LPR/EOR.

Why do we need cash?

We are seeking to raise £2000 in our initial efforts to raise the profile of this disease. This will support
  • Server and IT Costs £10-20 per month (3 years funding = £720). A domain name has already been secured.
  • Costs to access academic journals and articles relating to LPR. Unfortunately, information is not free these days.
  • Miscellaneous administration costs (e.g. stock photos for the site, domain name registration etc)
  • We expect to be able to have a web presence even if the funding falls short. However, the greater the funds, the more impact we can have.
  • We believe transparency is the key here and ALL financial transactions will be posted on the website, so that everyone can see where each and every cent has been spent.

Please note that the site requires independent funding sources as we will not accept any contributions from the healthcare industry or in fact any commercial source. We will also not be displaying advertising. This is vital if the site is to provide objective guidance.

How can you help?
We don't necessarily want big investors, just a few dollars or pounds here and there from anyone who is interested in battling this disease. We have heard countless stories of how people's lives have been changed through this annoying, horrible, irritating, unsettling, worrying,  ****** awful disease. Yes, the ***** is necessary for this disease.We know what it's like because we're going through it too. Right now.

We know lots of people are battling many serious conditions and many of those are more devastating than LPR. We don't want sympathy. We just want what everybody else with a chronic disease wants, the hope that one day it will be gone.

We're not saying this funding will change the situation  overnight. But isn't about time we started to change? Let's Play Rough and be rid of LPR.

story:
Abbiamo preso parte al mongol rally 2015, a bordo della nostra panda canestro, in questo momento siamo in Russia e nel giro di 10 giorno dovremmo arrivare in mongolia... Da lì prenderemo un volo per tornare in Italia, ma non vogliamo e non possiamo abbandonare la nostra auto li dopo quello che abbiamo passato in questo mese di viaggio.. Ci servono i soldi per caricare la macchina su un treno e riportarla in Italia! Grazie a chiunque voglia aiutarci!!
#SAVETHEPANDA

story:
ART LIFE CENTER


Description​ :     A sustainable Education center with Workshops & Classes
Goal​ :                    Develop greater consciousness between people and the Earth 
Motive​ :               Provide a proper education for future generations


We are young educators, life teachers, artists, permaculture activists and love spreading people with an enormous amount of creative energy to give ! 


Innovative school

We want to provide people with the tools and inspiration to live more fully...
Learn by doing in our permanent classes and workshops led by Isidora & Leonida. 

  • We believe that through more awareness of their environment, people and children can realize their creative potential and live with greater satisfaction.  We call it Cosmic Education

Sustainable Education Center

We want to create a sustainable Education and Retreat Center in the clean and quiet air of nature in Istria, Croatia. Come co-create a garden and natural houses, Céline will tell you all about efficient & free gardening.

  • The Art Life Centre will be self­sufficient, with a sustainable cyclical dynamic based on the seasons.
  • It is founded on principles of balance, creativity, diversity, respect, reuse and repurposing of materials.                                                                                                        We call it Permaculture.

Sustainability - We aim to understand and support the natural dynamics.


What we have is love, energy, purpose, and this urge to create a brighter future...
...for everyone.  

Why should i support ?

Believing in us is believing in a peaceful and balanced future for human kind, where our dreams are cherished ...

...where everything is possible. 

By supporting the project, you are participating in creating a new society, based on freedom! 

 Don't you want to be free? 

Free of frustrations, stress, worries, fears... 

And full of energy, inspiration, free to build up your life as you want and participate to the global good!  

             

THE ISSUES 

The world is in crisis. Cities are facing particularly big challenges as the climate changes and natural resources become scarcer. Industrialization and continued globalization threaten to wipe out the basic knowledge that has kept humankind in harmony with the planet for centuries. 


OUR SOLUTIONS

  • Rather than focus on developing technology, which disconnects us further from life, we want connect with the land and Nature, remind ourselves of our responsibility to Earth, of our love and care for this planet.
  • We are inspired by our own experiences of living in nature. We realize, after years away from cities, the importance of sharing this lost knowledge of living off the land, especially for children. 
  • Earth will soon be in the hands of the next generation. We want to provide them with the keys to access and maintain harmony between all living forms. We must begin to practice a cleaner, healthier and balanced lifestyle to secure our children a safe and rich future.


    Related Project : Korakor


     Why we need you...

    We are looking for your support to help us create the Art Life Centre in Istria, Croatia. We have found a beautiful piece of land with Eco-House. 

    Our primary costs for this project are: 

    • Land 1200m2 & Eco House 50m2 =€ 15000 .... to develop our Education center

    • Building materials (wood 450/m3)= € 5000 .... to build Workshop areas

      • TOTAL = € 20 000                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Once installed and built, the center will run only with the fruits from the garden and donation-based Workshops and classes. Since we aim to dedicate our time for the good and not for money. 
      We care about the future of our children. 

          We hope you are inspired to direct your energy to our cause! 


    Our Thanks.

    Support us and enjoy our handmade gifts 



    THE TEAM 

        Isidora  : Initiator. Artist. Teacher. Mother. 

    My life philosophy: "live to your full potential, support yourself and others in expressing inner talents, seek joy which comes from inside". Mine comes from living in harmony with nature! 
    •  After living in nature for four years, I feel it is my responsibility to share my expertise with others, to help create a space around respect and support of nature and people's talents. 

    In Action :     Co-founder of Emerald-Gardens Community. Leader of school class Workshops in Nature: Permaculture, natural healing, natural building. Jewelry artist. 


          Leonida  : Cosmic Educator. Teacher.  

     I encourage children to develop fully:  to understand the world, to develop inner strength and awaken their imagination.
    • My goal is to cultivate self­love for all beings in nature. There is a sense of belonging innate in children. Emotional security, self­confidence and positive self image must be nurtured. Together, we can create an amazing atmosphere and environment for our children.

    In Action :     Preschool Educator. Kindergarden teacher. 


        Céline : Compulsive thinker. Opportunity maker.  

    Life is... does any really know? I have found that life is full of love and mysterious beauty, and that's all I need! Our lives should be easy and thrilling !  
    • Too many people make their lives needlessly complicated and boring. I want people to deeply understand their world, and see what real joy and happiness is available to them.

    In Action :     Physics student. Artist. Permaculture Gardener in schools and community gardens. Activist. Seed keeper. 


       Mihaha : The business man. The Geek.

    I love life and discovery. I try to help my people as much as i can. I try to be a cool guy. I heard i'm not doing so bad.  

    In Action :     IT manager. Software architect. Investment expert. 


    HELPERS

    Biljana - Architect. 
    Franzi - Public Relation. 
    Stéphane - Web designer.


    SHARING IS CARING 

    • Please share our Campaign ! With friends, family and colleagues. 
    • Check out and like our official Facebook page! 
    • To learn and experience more, we invite you to visit Rovinj and our shop in Istria, where you can volunteer and find some of our art, jewelery and teaching materials.

    Thank you.

The Art Life Centre will be self­sufficient, with a sustainable cyclical dynamic based on
the seasons.


It is founded on principles of balance, creativity, diversity, respect, reuse
and repurposing of materials.                                                                                                        We call it Permaculture.


Sustainability - We aim to understand and support the natural dynamics.



What we have is love, energy, purpose, and this urge to create a brighter future...
...for everyone.  

Why should i support ?
Believing in us is believing in a peaceful and balanced future for human kind, where our dreams are cherished ...
...where everything is possible. 
By supporting the project, you are participating in creating a new society, based on freedom! 
 Don't you want to be free? 
Free of frustrations, stress, worries, fears... 
And full of energy, inspiration, free to build up your life as you want and participate to the global good!  

             

THE ISSUES 
The world is in crisis. Cities are facing particularly big challenges as the climate changes and natural resources become scarcer. Industrialization and continued globalization threaten to wipe out the basic knowledge that has kept humankind in harmony with the planet for centuries. 

OUR SOLUTIONS

Rather than focus on developing technology, which disconnects us further from life, we want connect with the land and Nature, remind ourselves of our responsibility to Earth, of our love and care for this planet.

We are inspired by our own experiences of living in nature. We realize, after years away from cities, the importance of sharing this lost knowledge of living off the land, especially for children. 


Earth will soon be in the hands of the next generation. We want to provide them with the keys to access and maintain harmony between all living forms. We must begin to practice a cleaner, healthier and balanced lifestyle to secure our children a safe and rich future.









Related Project : Korakor


 Why we need you...

We are looking for your support to help us create the Art Life Centre in Istria, Croatia. We have found a
beautiful piece of land with Eco-House. 
Our primary costs for this project are: 
Land 1200m2 & Eco House 50m2 =€ 15000 .... to develop our Education center
Building materials (wood 450/m3)= € 5000 .... to build Workshop areas

TOTAL = € 20 000                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Once installed and built, the center will run only with the fruits from the garden and donation-based Workshops and classes. Since we aim to dedicate our time for the good and not for money. 

We care about the future of our children. 

We hope you are inspired to direct your energy to our cause! 




Our Thanks.
Support us and enjoy our handmade gifts 





THE TEAM 
    Isidora  : Initiator. Artist. Teacher. Mother. 
My life philosophy: "live to your full potential, support yourself and others in expressing inner talents, seek joy which comes from inside". Mine comes from living in harmony with nature! 

 After living in nature for four years, I feel it is my responsibility to share my expertise with others, to help create a space around respect and support of nature and people's talents. 

In Action :     Co-founder of Emerald-Gardens Community. Leader of school class Workshops in Nature: Permaculture, natural healing, natural building. Jewelry artist. 


      Leonida  : Cosmic Educator. Teacher.  
 I encourage children to develop fully:  to understand the world, to develop inner strength and awaken their imagination.

My goal is to cultivate self­love for all beings in nature. There is a sense of belonging innate in children. Emotional security, self­confidence and positive self image must be nurtured. Together, we can create an amazing atmosphere and environment for our children.


In Action :     Preschool Educator. Kindergarden teacher. 


    Céline : Compulsive thinker. Opportunity maker.  

Life is... does any really know? I have found that life is full of love and mysterious beauty, and that's all I need! Our lives should be easy and thrilling !  


Too many people make their lives needlessly complicated and boring. I want people to deeply understand their world, and see what real joy and happiness is available to them.

In Action :     Physics student. Artist. Permaculture Gardener in schools and community gardens. Activist. Seed keeper. 






   Mihaha : The business man. The Geek.



I love life and discovery. I try to help my people as much as i can. I try to be a cool guy. I heard i'm not doing so bad.  
In Action :     IT manager. Software architect. Investment expert. 


HELPERS

Biljana - Architect. 

Franzi - Public Relation. 

Stéphane - Web designer.

   SHARING IS CARING  


Please share our Campaign ! With friends, family and colleagues. 
Check out and like our official Facebook page! 
To learn and experience more, we invite you to visit Rovinj and our shop in Istria, where you can volunteer and find some of our art, jewelery and teaching materials.
Thank you.

story:
Short Summary

Aloha my name is Darshan Mendoza. I am the founder of Akuaha, a Volcano Eco-Village Wellness Retreat in Hawaii. I teach Kundalini Yoga and Meditation, I practice Indigenous Healing, Bioenergetics Medicine and am also a writer.  


I was born in Quezon City, Philippines and grew up in Chicago. I awakened to my life purpose on the Big Island of Hawaii where the visions of Akuaha were seeded in my heart.  The last decade since these visions, has been one miraculous unfolding of initiation after the other, preparing me to anchor in these visions and create it tangibly on Earth.

This campaign is to raise $40,000 in 40 days to finish building 4 main components of our Akuaha Eco-Village: 1. The Healing Center  2. The Yin Yang Yurt Village 3. Our Aquaponic Farm and Edible Landscape 4. Ceremonial Spaces.  This is my expression of being the change I want to see in the world.  

If we can create this village together as a Global Tribe in this tiny island in the middle of the Pacific Ocean, then we can create this in all sacred spaces around the world for Planetary Healing and Transformation. 

It takes a village to build a village. With your contributions we will create together an Eco-Village where every human being who is called to the transformative energies of the Volcano can heal, transform, be inspired and share their passions and gifts with the World. 

This is all it takes for our World to completely heal and thrive in one generation. For every human being to have that inner-awakening to their creative divine power. When we heal deeply, we will be able to create from such a whole place of wisdom. Imagine a world where every human being has the freedom to live their purpose and dreams.

What We Need & What You Get

For the first phase of Building Akuaha we need $40,000 to complete what we have started. There are four areas to create and make beautiful here in our growing Eco-Village. Each project will receive $10,000 each : 

1. The Healing Center needs to finish the Salt Water Solar Heated Pool, Outdoor Spa Bathrooms and Outdoor Kitchen and Dining Space  

2. The Yin Yang Yurt Village needs to complete the Yurts, create a source of electricity, create outdoor spa bathrooms, create catfish and tilapia pond and plant fruit orchard  

3. Our Aquaponic Farm and Edible Food Forest needs to finish the 20x60ft greenhouse, create aquaponic system, plant spiral herb garden, put up strawberry and lilikoi trellises and plant an edible food forest in our 7-acre Volcanic paradise

4. Our Ceremonial Space needs to finish our tipis, finish the Bamboo Star Temple, create Ifugao Hut created by Ifugao Shaman and Sculptor Mamerto "Lagitan" Tindongan and mediation huts and paths through the Rainforest. 

Our way of saying MAHALO ~ SALAMAT ~ ARIGATO and THANK YOU in all other languages of the heart is to give you gifts of prayers, healing, opportunities of deep spiritual transformation and inspiration. We believe in the new paradigm flow of abundance in which generosity given from the heart is rewarded beyond our imaginations. 

 We offer :

  • your name being carved in the Founder's Table to be prayed over, celebrated over and feasted over daily
  • The Soul of Money by Lynn Twist
  • potent integrative massage packages
  • quantum healing and bioenergetics medicine sessions (long distance is possible)
  • 3-day retreats 
  • 10-day Tandaan passes (our annual Gathering for Ancestral Healing and Remembrance)
  • lifetime annual Tandaan passes
  • and a $4000 full scholarship to Nine Gates Mystery School (we mean business when it comes to expressing our gratitude) 
Your contributions will be stretched tremendously to reach across all four projects whether or not we reach our $40,000 goal. If we fall under, we will simply divide the contributions by four. If we exceed our goal, we will save the surplus for the next phase of our building which is our Recording Studio, Publishing House and Akashic Library and Storefront/Cafe in Volcano Village. 



The Impact

Building Akuaha is valuable to you, as a contributor / future guest / future wisdom sharer / future villager because it is creating a space on one of the most active Volcanos in the world to anchor in the healing and transformation of our planet. 
You are helping create a platform for yourself to heal, transform, be inspired and share your passion and gifts. Imagine being able to take part in this revolutionary  dream which we all have inside of us. The dream to share who we really are and our greatest gifts with the World.   The dream to affect our World with our unique brilliance and genius. 
Money is energy. Where do you want to place your energy this year? Which dreams would you like to water? 
We recently simulated our first attempt in Building a Village in 9 days during Tandaan here at Akuaha (July 27-August 4, 2015). Our intention is to gather all those who are called to be here, to learn from one another, share our medicine, heal our ancestral lineages (past, current and future), build a Star Temple and Ceremonial Spaces, plant a garden, cook and feast together.  In just 9 days, 30 people from all over the world gathered together and achieved this intention above and beyond our expectations. 



Tandaan will be an annual event amongst many gatherings we will have here at Akuaha. We are so inspired by this first gathering to see our vision come to life. This proves to us that we have the heart, strength, clarity and blessings to be successful in Building Akuaha.
The only way we can make this REAL for you is for you to come and join us. There is nothing more real than having your hands in the earth planting trees, reaching for your bolo (machete) and splitting bamboo to build ceremonial huts, receiving a healing that blows your heart wide open, connecting with people from all over the world and learning something you never knew before, remembering deeply who you are and what you came to Earth to contribute ... this is as REAL as it gets. Come join us and experience it for yourself. 

Risks & Challenges

If I were to listen to the risks and warnings other Eco-Village Founders have shared with me, I wouldn't have the courage to co-create Akuaha. The only risk of creating an Eco-Village centered around healing and transformation is the deep healing and transformation that will rock my world inside and out. That risk, I've already taken and continue to take. 

The obstacles I face are the initiations along the way which refine me and prepare me to be the leader and visionary midwifing Akuaha into reality.  I understand that I am not the one creating Akuaha, but a Force is working through me. The only risk there is which can cause this endeavor to fail is if I stand in the way of this creation. Isn't this the only risk we ALL face when we are on the brink of creating our dreams?


Other Ways You Can Help

Prayers, visiting us, volunteering your time, energy, wisdom and ideas, spreading the word, holding this vision and creating it on any level in your own communities and lives - this is our call to action for you.  

This is a MOVEMENT more so than a Business. This a LIVING REVOLUTION more so than a fundraising campaign. If you are inspired by what we are creating, and feel called to send love notes and testimony to us by what this inspired you to create, that is ultimately the greatest reflection and gift you can give us.

If this inspires you, please share far and wide into your social network and communities. Again, it takes a village to create a village. You never know what connections will spark with your sharing, what healing and transformation will take place, what realities will be created. We are on the brink of planetary transformation. Imagine the possibilities.

story:
Our Story

The Gyre is composed of three boys with mutual roots in upstate NY. Though they transplanted separately, the boys met quickly after landing in their new home of Portland, Oregon and have been planning this venture since.

Meet our Team

Leo Brill - Chef
Our chef and food curator, Leo has been in the food industry since he was a teenager. Currently Leo works at Levant, a top rated fine dining restaurant in Portland, and aboard the Bunk Sandwiches food truck.

Jarvis Town - Paper Chef
The business side of the cart, Jarvis grew up in a family business and studied Business at Stetson University in Florida, but left it all behind to start his own journey out west.

Joey Burnah - Sous Chef
The real brains behind it all, Joey studied at Paul Smith's College in NY obtaining a degree in Chefology, and is the aesthetic wizard of the cart. Joey fills in all the gaps that Leo and Jarvis leave open, being both a chef and an artist.


What We Need

We need start up funds!

With your contribution, we will be able to secure all permits to operate and funds for our initial inventory.

The Concept

The Gyre's namesake comes from a continent of garbage in the Pacific Ocean. We want to draw attention to the dire environmental situation humanity is in, without being preachy or self-righteous.

This NY Times video gives an explanation of what an actual gyre is, better than 3 boys in a kitchen could.
www.nytimes.com/video/science/100000002385362/into-the-gyre.html


The Impact

The Gyre's goal isn't strictly financial!

We know the importance of ecological responsibility, and we intend to make a point that our customers will too. All of the materials we use will be local and upcycled whenever possible. Our inventory will be local, seasonal, and purchased from sustainable, organic farms whenever possible.

As we develop our business, we will implement profit donation programs to environmentally focused charities. We also plan to share our concerns for our planet's welfare with our patrons in a non-intrusive manner.


Stewardship

The Gyre plans to work with local artists and businesses to develop dishes inspired by local culture. This will enrich the community, as it will draw together disparate groups, bringing attention to other small businesses and local creators.


Why invest?

The Gyre is a lucrative investment opportunity, both financially and socially. We have the opportunity for unlimited menu variations with a unique and practical style. Our food utilizes high quality ingredients, and above all, tastes good.

From a business investment standpoint, our business has high growth potential, as we plan to eventually expand into a brick-and-mortar location. We intend to establish ourselves as a recognized brand and proceed to open a music venue/restaurant with the same values and delicious food. Plus giving us money will make you feel good.
