story:
A Midsummer Nights Dream Campaign

Meet Laura & Shirleyann, two single Pisces moms and yoginis, from the sleepy little town of Floyd,  who conceived an improbable idea... a 3 day, Outdoor Festival full of Music, Movement, Magic & Art, nestled in the valley of a small farm in the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains of rural Virginia.

The duo leveraged all their savings, enlisted the help of friends and neighbors, created the Dancin' Dakinis production company and embarked on a 5 year odyssey to build a unique, homegrown festival designed to nourish the body, heart and soul. 

Enter the Floyd Yoga Jam!  Known by followers as the Best Little Independent Yoga Festival on the East Coast, has grown from 700 to over 2500+ attendees who come together every Labor Day Weekend in early September to celebrate their love of Yoga, Dance, Art, Music, Great Food and Community!
 This is the 5th year and the theme:  A Midsummer Nights Dream.

This young startup now finds itself in an exciting place...wanting to expand the festival to be able to support quality programing for it's goal of 5,000 attendees.  To do this the Dancin' Dakinis need a capital investment fund to continue to build a safe, fun and exciting experience for all! 

What We Want to Achieve  

With Capital Investment of $20,000 or more, the Floyd Yoga Jam can achieve some very important goals in order of importance and priority:

  • Art Village & Kids Village teachers & material costs.   The Yoga Jam believes in Free Art for All!   Your investment will help ensure we can provide free art workshops for children and adults alike.    
  • Start Up & Production costs for the NEW  Tea Shanti Speakeasy , a fundraising vehicle for local non-profits, who serve herbal teas and host thought provoking speakers, discussions and poetry slams to investigate topics that can effect social change. 
  • Expansion of the Parks & Recreation Department to facilitate the construction of a Frisbee Disc Golf Course as well as support more guided hiking, biking and running trails, plus orienteering and geo-caching workshops.
  • Mundane logistical needs; ie., composting stations, recycling and trash containers, Art Village tent, more Tiki Torches and Outdoor Lighting, Ambiance and Decorating items, etc.  

The more support we receive, the more we can achieve!

Great Floyd Yoga Jam Perks! 

Everyone who contributes receives a perk and our undying love gratitude plus bragging rights! You can get:

  • Handmade Prayer Flags from past Floyd Yoga Jams-unique original art infused with festival love.   
  • Donate and the Tribe will Spin the Yoga Jam Prayer Wheel in your honor!  Your name will be added to our Namaste' Ya'll Wall announcing all the enlightened souls who made a donation and want to see the Floyd Yoga Jam achieve its goals!   
  • Indigo Blue Yoga Jam SiliPint Beverage Cup with tokens for free beer, wine, coffee or kombucha.         
  • Healing Oasis Massage-enjoy a 60 minute massage during the event.  
  • Nirvanna Night-saturday night backstage dance party access, drinks and tapas and meet n greet MC Yogi!        
  • Enlightened Endowment-Want to make a Big Donation? Receive Big Love and Special Perks!  

Be the Change you wish to See in the World!

The World needs places like the Floyd Yoga Jam!   

The Floyd Yoga Jam is a production of the Dancin' Dakinis, the Community of Floyd, VA and People like You! People who believe they can make a difference in a world of divisiveness, corporate greed and extractive economies.   This is an event that brings people of all ages, creeds and colors together to experience a safe place to play, grow and transform.  

This incredible journey could not have reached this point without the creative passion of Laura & Shirleyann or the Love and Support of the Yoga Jam Tribe! With continued support we can craft an even more outstanding festival and reach more souls and spread more Love! 

They said it couldn't be done!

From the very beginning of this journey, there were people who said it couldn't be done.   People wouldn't come.  Local banks didn't want to lend money.   Business didn't want to sponsor such a crazy scheme.   Narrow minds didn't want people practicing strange religions or speaking weird words like Namaste' or Yoga.  County Supervisors were worried about crowds and trash. 

The Floyd Yoga Jam has been building bridges since it's very first festival!   Taxes have been paid.  Businesses have seen increased sales.  Visitors have experienced the beauty and charm of Floyd County.   The word of this improbable event has spread and devotees have returned year after year.   

Not meeting the Capital Investment Goal means the Floyd Yoga Jam might not be able to provide special touches as soon as hoped.   But we can't stop now...this is just too important not to work just a little harder to be the Best Little Independent Yoga Festival on the East Coast!

Namaste' Y'all! 

If a contribution isn't possible for you right now?   You can still help us achieve our goals!   Spread the Love!   Spread the Word!  Tell Your Yoga Class or Teachers to check us out!   Every dollar makes a big difference to the success of this endeavor!

story:
Sahabu’s stillness

Every year in Uganda a great percentage of children are born with disabilities and few live to celebrate their 5th birthdays due to the unkind conditions that distress them, either due to the recklessness of those close to them, long distances to hospitals and clinics or just mere neglection from hospital staff whereby if not given some money, they won’t administer treatment to them. 

Kisakye sahabu was born 16 years ago in idogolo, a village in Jinja district, Uganda to Naigaga Barbra and Muzamiru Menya who were both unemployed; Barbra a teenage mother could barely afford a daily meal yet was abandoned by her reckless husband who later denied responsibility of his family due to his son’s medical situation that was at hand , Sahabu was then taken to his grandmother’s home Mrs. Sssegonga Mary a 62 year old woman where with the help her other daughter Rachel Magoola have managed to support, raise and protect Sahabu .

Rachel Magoola Who turns out to be a maternal aunt to Sahabu tells his story as he cannot talk, feed or sit on his own.

“Sahabu’s situation started way back when he was 3 months old, he could not  do what  a normal three month baby was supposed to do , he would neither move his limbs nor play around , and respond to different sounds like other children of  his age; we didn’t know that these were the first signs of his illness.  At 9 years he developed a spinal cord disorder that has restrained him to his bed up to today” she recalls.

“We were then forced to take him to katalemwa, a rehabilitation centre with the help of his grandmother where he was diagnosed with permanent paralysis, this was the biggest blow our family could take because with barely enough support from the father’s side both physical and financial, our greatest night mare hit us the more” she goes on to lament. “We were asked to buy a wheel chair for his support but then we couldn’t afford it not even could we afford a supporting belt for his spinal cord. The cost of the wheel chair and supporting belt by then (2014) was 2,298,000 Uganda shillings (USD $.686). This is thrice my monthly earnings.

We then desperately decided to let off some of his siblings stay away from school just to help lift and assist him whenever he needed to either sit, feed, or help himself. It has now become a burden to most of them who have decided to run away from home because of the fatigue they have to face every day, so they have let him be which has pushed his grand mother to restrain and help him alone but as we all know its very difficult for a woman her age to manage.

In 2014, while on a Mobile clinic in Idogolo , Tiner Africa Foundation with the help of Benjamin Musasizi and a group of medical doctors led by Dr.Chris Bingi identified Sahabu who was found to weigh less his age and was put under special care and the nutrition clinic for futher observation. Every month the organization renders treatment and financial help to Sahabu’s family.

Currently Sahabu’s greatest need is to get a wheel chair and to get him to a rehabilitation centre where he can be helped to access the right treatment for his situation.This will cost USD $.5421.

Sahabu will also need to be taken to a special needs education school once he is done with his treatment to attain skills.

We are now looking for friends and partners to help Sahabu and other children in his category. Contact us on email address: care@tinerfoundation.org to get involved. You can also visit our website: www.tinerfoundation.org to know more about us.

We are glad to help people like sahabu with our different approaches tailored towards meeting the most unique characteristics and needs of children as they progress, join us fight ignorance among the grass root people , let as stand as one and be part of a greater change in Uganda.

story:
BE PREPARED: You Have a 1 in 3 Chance of Getting Infested with Blood-Sucking Bed Bugs In 2016

Bed bugs are attracted to you while you sleep by the carbon dioxide (CO2) you exhale when you breathe. ClearVue Bed Bug Traps use this natural instinct to attract and trap bed bugs as they come looking for you.  Our traps intercept bed bugs 24/7 using scientifically designed, patent-pending technology that mimics their favorite food (you).

If just one egg-laying female bed bug hitches a ride on your clothes and you bring it home, it can produce an infestation of bed bugs in just a few weeks.  Even worse, you're very unlikely to detect bed bugs in your home until you have thousands already living with you.

The scale of this problem has reached global proportions. Bed bugs do not discriminate, affecting people of all incomes and in all neighborhoods in apartments, condos, houses, hotels, schools, public transportation, hospitals, businesses, and even movie theaters. 

What Makes ClearVue Traps So Effective?

ClearVue Traps intercept hungry bed bugs that come out of hiding seeking a meal. Our traps use a safe low-level carbon dioxide (CO2) beacon which mimics the exhaled breath of a human. This CO2 becomes highly concentrated within the base of the trap, forming a pocket of CO2 that bed bugs cannot resist. Natural instincts compel bed bugs to follow the CO2 beacon to its source where it is trapped on a glue floor. Once inside, the patent-pending design ensures trapped bed bugs can't escape.

Pesticide powder and spray treatments force bed bugs to flee and hide deeper inside your walls making the problem worse over the long run. In addition, pesticide sprays expose your home and family to potentially toxic chemicals.

ClearVue's active traps use no toxic chemicals or pesticides. Each trap takes less than a minute to prepare and place, and protects your family for weeks. We recommend replacing the traps monthly for continuous monitoring and protection.

ClearVue Traps have been field tested and proven effective in a number of locations:

  • A multi-family apartment with a severe infestation: After repeated use of ClearVue traps, several thousand bed bugs were captured and the tenants reported no more bites.
  • A major hotel that had been spraying rooms with pesticide powders and sprays for 15 years but couldn’t eliminate their bed bug problem: Immediately following professional spray treatments (which can drive bed bugs deeper into the walls), physical inspections revealed no more bugs in the rooms. But placing ClearVue Traps continued to draw out and trap more bed bugs.
  • A validation test by a top regional pest control company in a house with an active bed bug infestation awaiting professional heat treatment: Hundreds of bed bugs were intercepted before they could reach their human hosts.
  • An apartment that had been sprayed weekly for nine weeks in a row: Within 15 minutes of placing a ClearVue trap, an adult female bed bug was captured.

Monitoring and Interception is EXTREMELY Important!

Bed bugs can hide in paper-thin crevices and typically come out at night to feed on blood from you, your kids and your pets. Bed bugs are so incredibly tiny they’re able to spread from room to room using the wall outlets and air vents. If your neighboring apartment has bed bugs, you're only six inches away from having them too.


Bed bugs only feed on fresh blood. In severe cases, people have been bitten up to 500 times in one night. By the time you see even one bed bug, there are usually hundreds or thousands more hiding nearby.

ClearVue Traps are Simple to Use

ClearVue Traps have been designed for superior performance using patent-pending technologies. Measuring just 4 inches by 5 inches by 1 inch tall, these traps are small enough to be hidden discreetly throughout your home.

Activate the trap by pouring the included Activation Liquid onto the sponge, placing the tablets on the sponge, and replacing the cap.  Once activated, simply place one trap on the floor at each bedpost at the head of your bed for monitoring, or one at all 4 bedposts for further protection.

The bed bug food beacon is produced using non-toxic, food-grade materials. The trap’s sticky surfaces are tucked away inside. The trap's design lets you easily see any trapped bugs. The traps are disposable so once you intercept bed bugs, you can get them out of your home with the included "No-Touch, No-Escape" disposal bag.  Activate new traps monthly for best results.

We Need Your Help

We've developed a proven solution that's effective in early detection as well as trapping and eliminating bed bugs in infested homes. We need your support to raise a minimum of $50,000 to cover the production costs of our first commercial-scale manufacturing to get traps into the hands of people who really need them.

We’re focusing our efforts from the crowd funding proceeds on providing traps to VA hospitals and homeless shelters.  The perks shown are intended to help people in these locations where bed bugs are a known problem.

Over the past two years we've built thousands of hand-crafted prototypes, refining our designs and our knowledge of bed bug behavior. The traps perform extremely well, are easy to activate, and the feedback has been very positive.  

We’re planning to continue supporting veterans and the homeless in our ongoing business activities once we have the initial production run completed.

What You Can Do...

Please donate today by clicking the BACK IT button at the top right or choose one of the Perks below this button.

After you donate, please share this campaign with others - the faster we reach our goal, the faster we can get traps into the hands of people who desperately need them.

Click here to pre-order traps from our production run so you can monitor your homes and protect your family.

Click here to get updates on our progress as we move to the commercial market.

We need your support to raise a minimum of $50,000 to cover the production costs of our first commercial-scale manufacturing to get traps into the hands of people who really need them.We’re focusing our
efforts from the crowd funding proceeds on providing traps to VA hospitals and
homeless shelters.  The perks shown are
intended to help people in these locations where bed bugs are a known problem.Over the past two years we've built thousands of hand-crafted prototypes, refining our designs and our knowledge of bed bug behavior. The traps perform extremely well, are easy to activate, and the feedback has been very positive.  We’re planning to
continue supporting veterans and the homeless in our ongoing business
activities once we have the initial production run completed.What You Can Do...

Please donate today by clicking the BACK IT button at the top right or choose one of the Perks below this button.
After you donate, please share this campaign with others - the faster we reach our goal, the faster we can get traps into the hands of people who desperately need them.
Click here to pre-order traps from our production run so you can monitor your homes and protect your family.
Click here to get updates on our progress as we move to the commercial market.

story:
www.Playen.co or www.Playen.co/info

Play on the App Store.
Investor? Visit Play On AngelList.
Play on Crunchbase.
Play on Instagram.
Play on Twitter.
Play on Facebook.

Thank you for taking the time... 

...to consider helping fund the Play Entertainment Network!

Play is a new start-up tech company that we believe will revolutionize the entertainment and event discovery industries, and how they connect to the marketplace. Consider Play a "Social Platform" used for discovering and connecting with everything happening around you and around the world. Play will be the best way for businesses to promote their products at the exact moment that there is demand for them.

Play is the missing variable in current event discover platforms that fail to increase user interaction with the platform when the user is not in need of the event discovery service. Play's social interactions create an urge and dependency to return to the platform even when there is no need of event discovery services.

The concept is simple: people use Play to discover activities and events, Play connects people with activities and events, and businesses reach consumers through featured and non-featured targeted placement.

Playen started to experiment early in 2015. By August 2015 we built our first beta MVP. Between August and December 2015 we launched the beta, 300+ users participated in the Beta testing. January marked the official non-beta release for the Play Network, and so far the response is incredible! 

- 8000+ Events Now on Network.
- 700+ Businesses Now on Network.
- 0$ spent on advertisement as of yet.

(Data includes all major cities in Canada, some major cities in USA, and some major cities across Europe. As well as some smaller markets across North America. Updated: January 20th 2016)

What Sets Us Apart

Play combines event discover with a social platform that provokes users to use the platform even at the times that they are not interested in event discovery. The act of sharing moments, likes and comments on these moments creates the play social aspect, which increases the users urge and dependency to return to the Play platforms. In addition, Playens "Live Room" function enables users to interact with other users while at the same live event.

What We Need

We are currently seeking $30,000.00 to help us bring Play to its next level. 

Currently, Playens flagship platform is only available through the iOS app store and a less interactive version on the website. 

The funding would help us continue developing the iOS app, create and deploy the Android app, continue developing the website, initiate marketing, and seek additional consulting. 

Why + More

Our mission is to change the world! By integrating technology like PLAY seamlessly into everyday life in order to achieve a higher standard in living. Our goal is to become a leading force in personal entertainment for the masses, integrating our services with all aspects of daily entertainment.

To begin, Play helps you discover and experience trending events like never before! Now, when events become live in the real world, they also become live on the Play Entertainment Network. If you’re at the event, Play connects you, and all the other event attendees, to a virtual room where you can browse, post, like, and share live moments as they’re happening. Cool hey? If you happen to not be at the event, check in with the event from anywhere in the world to see what you’re missing!

Play is all about moments lived, and moments are best shared with friends. Play helps you create and experience these moments around you, across the globe, tailored specifically to you, and shared with your friends. Just the way life should be.

The Founder

Jeremie is a 26 year old male currently residing in Calgary, Alberta Canada. At the age of 17 Jeremie began his entrepreneurial journey by creating an event promotion company specialized in hosting “All Ages” nightclub events. By the age of 19, this company grew and evolved to be one of the top event production companies in Calgary. Working alongside some of the biggest names in his industry, Jeremie continued to produce and promote events for a total of 8 years. 
For more on Jeremie, visit: www.JeremieDurand.com

Other Ways You Can Help

If you want to be part of our movement, but are unable to contribute to funding, there are other methods you can help!

  • Help spread the word by sharing this on facebook and twitter!
  • Comments are always nice!
  • The Play Network is live! The easiest thing you can do is help spread the word by sharing our website!
  • Provide mentorship, direction and feedback! Our lines are always open and we appreciate EVERYTHING! www.Playen.co/contact to get in touch with us!

story:
WHO WE ARE

We are Tim and NiQui Chatfield, married for 29 years, parents to 5 children and business partners for 15 years. 2015 was a rough year to say the least – starting with selling our home of 7 years and then a stage 3-cancer diagnosis for NiQui a week later. It took all year, all of our energy and resources to battle the cancer. We lost our land that we had planned to build our homestead on.  Now it is a new year, and we are taking charge of our lives with the knowledge learned surviving 2015. The lesson is to be self-reliant, accountable, and consciously seek a simpler life. We have been devastated and it is time to rebuild - and we need your help to do that.

WHAT’S THE PROBLEM and WHY SHOULD YOU CARE?

This campaign is to fund the start of our new business, Sunshine Seasons that offers a variety of products for people wanting to scale back their life to better enjoy living with the land. This venture is a direct result of our own journey and learning what is truly important in life. As we are at a point in our lives where personal resources are scarce but passion and determination are abundant, we WILL make this all happen - we have to. Interestingly enough there is a season for everything in life – and Spring is the best time for us to start ... coincidentally it's the best time to start this type of business!

The physical business located in Delaware County will offer a variety of products from the tiniest of seeds all the way up to high-quality, Amish built tiny homes. Sunshine Seasons has secured the property location, set up manufacturers that will supply us with the quality products that we will be retailing (see pics in the Photo Gallery). Also, Sunshine Seasons has set up the network of local businesses and organizations that share our mission. Why is this important? An essential part of the vision is to partner and educate others on the benefits of this lifestyle. The only thing missing is the funding to bring the whole vision to life.

WE NEED YOU AS A PARTNER

Your financial contribution is essential to making this happen. Without you it will not get off the ground. This is a valuable project you can be a part of from the start by helping us cross the bridge to our new, better life and business. Together we can make a difference for Tim, Niqui and most importantly our community.

This business will serve a much needed market in the community and it will help us generate the money to buy land again (we lost our land last year) so that we can build our own homestead like we have been dreaming of for the last 10 years.

What We Need & What You Get

What exactly is this new business? Homesteading products such as:

·  Four Square Garden Kits

·  Potting Sheds

·  Tiny Homes

·  Barns

·  Chicken Coops

·  Poly Furniture

How will we sell them? Tim has been in sales for 20 years. We have secured a lease for an excellent location on a high-traffic highway in Central Ohio. This allows us to exhibit a homestead experience for people who visit and shop at our retail location. We have also set up partnerships with an Amish Building Company for the sheds, tiny houses, chicken coops, play sets, barns, and poly furniture.

Why do we need $20,000?

Funds will go to the items in the order they are listed below:

1. Fees to comply with Township and County Building Codes: $1,000

2. Utility set up fees  $1000

3. Lease for Commercial Property, $1500 per month, to get started we need $4,500

4. Excavation of the site and prep for buildings: $2,000

5. Initial Marketing: $2,000

6. Cost of some of the Products to display and sell: $7,500

7. Landscaping of the site and around buildings: $2,000

Total  $20,000

The most important aspect is to secure the excellent location, prepare the nearly 1 acre of land and be ready to sell. Many of our partnerships are placing products at no cost to us to display and sell. But we will need some inventory (the $7500) to have on hand to sell right away.

Perks:

Dog Treats

Granola

Coffee Mugs

T-Shirts

Logo Creation Contest

Four Square Gardening Kit

Back to Eden presentation and hands on instruction

The Impact

We are very excited to bring awareness; education and products to our community that will help people realize a healthy, successful life of being more self-sufficient. For the urbanite, the small land owner, business owners in the community – learning to garden wherever you are, have a tiny home mentality wherever you are; take care of yourself and ensure your own well-being.

With our business Progress Academy/Polaris School we offered an affordable Kindergarten through graduation curriculum package online to families all over the world. We continue to want to build businesses that solve problems, help families and improve the community we live in.

What Qualifies Us to do this Business?

We have run several successful businesses and employed dozens of people in our history. This is the first time we have done a campaign like this to ask for help getting this new business started. We have set up very successful partnerships, arranged an excellent location and lease, created a website, and have done our research and practical application of the homesteading products. Now we simply need help bridging the gap from where we are now to the launch of this new venture. The businesses we have started so far have been bootstrapped, in which we did not invest large amounts of capital. We are good at being creative and getting things done. We are very fortunate that Tim is able to creatively solve issues associated with new and established businesses, for instance he built a basic website for this new business (www.sunshineseasons.com) and that will save us considerable money.

Other Ways You Can Help

We thank you for taking the time to read our story. It has been difficult over the past year to stay in touch with family and friends. And we hope that this will open the window into a view of our lives. We appreciate your love, support, well wishes and hopefully your contribution. We would respectfully ask you to share this with all of your friends, family and business contacts. Indiegogo provides many tools to make sharing easy. Our family’s story can be an inspiration to many and we thank you for sharing.

story:
Our Story

Vive Bistro and Bakery was born when Pam Hathaway had a dream to actively change the misconception that plant-based food is bland and unsatisfying.  With a passion for creating flavor combinations that pique your palate, and decades of restaurant experience, Pam set out to create a unique dining experience.  Vive Bistro and Bakery offers an updated twist on French cuisine in a warm and inviting atmosphere in the heart of downtown Rochester, NY.

A true grass roots start-up, Vive has humble roots.  Pam began testing recipes in her kitchen and attending local events to gather feedback and interest.  After assembling a dynamic team, one thing led to another and Vive opened in Rochester's East End in February of 2015.

Executive Chef, Mark DeMara brings an inventive approach to Vive's cuisine.  Always striving for excellence, Mark works tirelessly to fine tune each recipe, which led him to be chosen for the local culinary challenge, Dish It Out - a competition of 16  top chefs.  Pam and Mark work together on each seasonal menu striving to use the best local and organic produce.  Vive was named as a Top Pick in 2015 by Rochester Magazine, and one of 100 Best Restaurants in Rochester in 2016 by Yelp.


Vive in the News

Rochester Woman Magazine

City Newspaper


What People are Saying

One of the best dining experiences I've had in recent memory. I'm an unabashed omnivore and food enthusiast. Food is one of the greatest loves of my life; I can't imagine a life without all incarnations of it. HOWEVER. If all vegan food is as inspired and beautifully executed as the food at Vive, well, things could be very different for me. As Stanley M. said, Wow!  ~ Leslie S., via Yelp

Vive Bistro, a Wow for Rochester! It feels nearly impossible to be able to find all of the following in one restaurant: amazing food, great portions, friendly staff, pleasant atmosphere, decent prices, appealing location, exceptional service and passion. Vive Bistro and Bakery has exceeded expectations in all these areas simultaneously.  - Love to Ear,  via Trip Advisor

Our hostess who made the reservation chose this restaurant because of its excellent reputation. My vegan daughter and I were in heaven because the food was so beautifully presented and delicious. Even the meat and potatoes guy in the group had nothing to complain about – he had a pizza and was very happy. No longer can I consider Rochester to be a small town, this restaurant is big time for sure! ~suzagord, via Happy Cow

Fantastic, one of the best eateries in Rochester NY if not upstate NY! Not your same old same old here, I went there on a gloomy dreadful day and boy did they brighten the mood! The food was superb, the service was fast and the staff was cheerful and delightful. I can't wait to recommend Vive to everyone I know who loves eating mouth watering, good creative food! LOVE VIVE!! ~Brian, via Google


What We Need and What you Get

As we enter our second year, we are looking to expand our visibility and reach in the community as well as develop new streams of revenue.  In order to do this, we are looking to raise funds for operating capital, paid-for advertising, and wholesale supplies.  We are also looking for people to help share Vive's story and become a household name in Rochester.

Our funding goal will allow us to keep going in the upcoming months.  With the community behind us, and our story becoming known, our in-house sales will begin to grow.  We have recently begun wholesaling to local businesses and will continue with that focus as a way of expanding our visibility.  Another area of revenue we plan to develop is lunch catering, and over the next upcoming months, we plan to target businesses close to Vive.

Once our target funding is reached, additional funds raised will allow us to repair and/or replace existing equipment as well as purchase equipment that will help with wholesale, such as a cryovac machine.  We also plan to hire additional staff to keep up with increased business.

Your generous contributions will help take Vive to the next level, and you'll get some cool perks. We invite you to become part of the Vive family today!


The Impact

Your contribution will not only help a small business succeed, it will:

  • Save the lives of countless animals.
  • Help people transition to a more compassionate, and/or healthy lifestyle.
  • Give people more plant-based options at different locations throughout the city.

Risks & Challenges

With a year under our belt, we've learned what works and what doesn't.  We are constantly collecting and analyzing feedback from our guests.  While so many of you have expressed the need for Vive in other cities, we are focused on becoming a mainstay in Rochester.  It takes time, effort and resources to do so.

We are real people with a passion for what we do, and the desire to succeed.  Pam Hathaway invested and risked everything she has to build Vive's foundation. Vive's roots have been planted with love and tender care, minimizing any start up risk to you. 

Until now, our primary way of advertising has been word of mouth and social media.  We have built a great base of regular guests and loyal fans, but there are plenty of people who have yet to experience Vive.  Through paid for advertising and our work building business partnerships through wholesale opportunities, our goal is to grow our sales and become self-sustaining in 2016.

Over the past year, we have tweaked our processes and procedures.  Our product is consistent and each member of our team knows what is expected of them and can be relied on to take on responsibilities other than their own if need be.

Other Ways You Can Help

There are plenty of ways to help us as we expand our brand, and all are appreciated!

Share our campaign with your family and friends, or people who share our passion of innovative plant-based cuisine.

Share and comment on our videos on youtube, or posts on Instagram and Facebook. Help our campaign go viral!

Pass out our flyers and take out menus at your workplace, school or community center.

Book a party at Vive, bring friends in for happy hour, have us cater your next work lunch.

Write about us in your blog.

Post pictures of you wearing Vive gear, or enjoying a delicious meal at the restaurant.

Send us your own video testimonial about how much you love Vive to add to our campaign!

Vive's roots have been planted with love and tender care, minimizing any start up risk to you.  Until now, our primary way of advertising has been word of mouth and social media.  We have built a great base of regular guests and loyal fans, but there are plenty of people who have yet to experience Vive.  Through paid for advertising and our work building business partnerships through wholesale opportunities, our goal is to grow our sales and become self-sustaining in 2016.Over the past year, we have tweaked our processes and procedures.  Our product is consistent and each member of our team knows what is expected of them and can be relied on to take on responsibilities other than their own if need be.    Other Ways You Can Help There are plenty of ways to help us as we expand our brand, and all are appreciated! Share our campaign with your family and friends, or people who share our passion of innovative plant-based cuisine.Share and comment on our videos on youtube, or posts on Instagram and Facebook. Help our campaign go viral!Pass out our flyers and take out menus at your workplace, school or community center.Book a party at Vive, bring friends in for happy hour, have us cater your next work lunch.Write about us in your blog.Post pictures of you wearing Vive gear, or enjoying a delicious meal at the restaurant.Send us your own video testimonial about how much you love Vive to add to our campaign!

story:
Why are we creating Pages4Pets.com?

Why?  Because the Pets we love deserve the attention...  And, we think the world is ready for a pet specific, social-media website!  Someplace we can share all the great things that make our Pets, our Pets!  

Pages4Pets is a FREE, Web-Based resource dedicated to sharing our Pet experiences with a community of like-minded Pet lovers.   We are creating an easy to use website, where anyone can post their own Pet related profile called a Pet-Page.  We encourage communication between members of the Pages4Pets community by implementing a user to user chat feature, as well as sharing informational links relative to our Pets.  A number of additional community functions and activities will be supported, including a section where accredited organizations who do good for animals, can post information about their services. All activities posted by Pages4Pets are intended to further bring the Pet community together. Sharing the chronicles of our Pet's adventures, and those special moments we spend together, will build a warmer bond between us.

On Pages4Pets, anyone can create a Pet-Page for their Pet.  Your Pet-Page can be shared with millions of people around the world and  can include pictures, videos, descriptions, comments and information about the Pets we love and cherish.  Have multiple Pets - create multiple Pet-Pages.  Is your Pet a Dog? Cat? Bird? Horse? Whatever! All Pets are important and all types of Pets are welcome on Pages4Pets! Our goal  is to provide you with the platform and tools needed to quickly and easily bring your Pet-Page together and make it something to be proud of!

Page4Pets is initially being launched in the USA, but our ultimate goal is to make it available in many countries around the world.   


Our Pets are important to us!

Sometimes we are not sure if we are raising our Pet - or vice-versa! We do know however, that our relationship with our Pets is woven into the fabric of our everyday life.   Our Pets are considered an integral part of our family. So let's treat them like members of the family - make them Social Media Stars!

Ever spend time with your Pet and wonder what they were thinking?  We suspect you know your Pet much better than you think, and vice-versa.  On Pages4Pets you act as your Pet's personal biographer, keeping a running account of their life and adventures.  We humans are just the tool for preserving these special memories!


What can Pages4Pets do for you and your Pet?

At Pages4Pets, we are on a mission to create an easy to use website that allows everyone to share their experiences involving Pets.  Sharing with others who similarly appreciate the relationship we  have with our Pets can be a fun way of expanding our connections with other Pet minded people.  As a Social Media platform for Pets, Pages4Pets will share many similarities to popular human social media platforms - except everything is about your Pet.  We will offer a feature rich environment where you can record and share all those special things about your Pet.  

Some of the features included in Pages4Pets are: 

  • Photos and Videos:  upload Photos and Videos of your Pet in action, or sharing a warm moment with the family.  These can also be archived in the Circle of Life feature which is described below.
  • Lost & Found:   is a section devoted to helping Pets and families reunite when one or the other goes missing.  Members can post special pages to this section describing their lost Pet and any pertinent information that may lead to their being reunited.   Pages can also be posted in this section describing lost Pets you may have come across in our neighborhood.
  • Play Date:   is a community resource where members can arrange play dates for their Pets with other members of the Pages4Pets community, or announce community gatherings involving your Pets 
  • Community Chat:  is a resource of the website whereby community members can exchange Pet related ideas, information and comments with others through chat/messaging/notifications 
  • Best-Buds: is similar to Friends on a typical human social media site. Requests to become a Best-Bud must be accepted by the creator of the Pet-Page 
  • Golden Age: is devoted to issues relating to senior citizens and special needs humans, who have a special bond with their Pets.  This section supports comments and suggestions unique to seniors and service dog owners
  • Bravo:  is a feature that is similar to Liking something about a posting or pictures on a typical human social site  
  • Indiegogo Wall of Fame:   will recognize and honor the members of our community who have supported this Indiegogo funding campaign and helped to make it a success
  • Circle of Life: is an automated tool for creating a visual representation of the life of your Pet, and can be viewed by community members visiting your page (see more info below)
  • Our Search:   provides Pages4Pets members  the ability to search the Pet community by category, and that search can be factored by distance from your location
  • Who's Online:  presents an opportunity to see which other members of the community are currently online and available for chat  
  • Our Heroes:   this section feature pages describing accredited organizations who devote their time and resources in a best effort to help Pets in general, and disadvantaged Pets in particular.  Donation links directly to these qualified organizations will be featured on their page
  • In-Rememberance:  is devoted to our beloved Pets who have passed on to another life.  Special Pet-Pages can be created to help remember the Pets we have enjoyed throughout our lives.   Existing Pet-Pages can be moved to this section upon the passing of your Pet
  • Daily Blog:  is a section of your Pet-Page that serves as a diary of the daily adventures of you and your Pet  


A Little More About Lost & Found!


Have you ever had that sinking feeling when you realize your Pet is not where they are supposed to be?  All of us who have lost Pets, even for a short time, realize the anxiety and pain that this experience can bring.  

We want Pages4Pets to become THE community resource for reuniting lost Pets with their families.  We will prominently feature a section of the website called Lost & Found.  
We will encourage members of the community to post a special notice in this section when they find that their Pet is lost or missing.  Concerned community members may also post information on abandoned/found Pets they may see in their neighborhood. We would also like to solicit the help of the Pet community in making various animal shelters and support groups aware of this tool for reuniting lost Pets with their families.  We intend to provide a method by which these organizations can review posts and contact information for missing Pets in their area, as well as post Pet-Pages for newly found Pets. 
Because this is a nationwide website that can be searched by Zip Code, we will be able to help isolate the whereabouts of lost or found Pets.  If you are active with any of the animal support organizations in your area, please ask them to reach out to us so we can bring this important feature to life in the shortest possible time.



Circle of Life for my Pet?

At Pages4Pets, we have spent a great deal of time looking at features and functionality available on many of the more prominent human social media services. The first thing that is obvious is the amount of digital data we associate with those services - photos. videos, blogs, comments, friends requests, likes etc.  What is not so obvious is how to quickly find a particular piece of digital information buried in your mountain of social media.

With that in mind, we are developing the Circle of Life for your Pet.  Imagine a circular graphic representation that easily and quickly allows you to select a specific year in the life of your Pet.  Once selected, you are offered a number of options to view the various content that was pinned to that year.  

Upload any data to your Pet-Page and you will be asked if you want to pin it to the Circle of Life.  Same goes for all the other categories of digital content. Just plug in the year this event happened and it is now available. The data pinned to the selected year will be shown in a chronological manner within that year.  This allows you to quickly review everything that occurred, or was said about your Pet, in the course of that year.  No more digging around trying to figure out where a particular picture went and how to find it.  Of course, we will also support individual folders that can contain data both pinned and unpinned to your Circle of Life.

We are well on our way to having the architecture for this feature completed and encourage any feedback./suggestions/comments you can offer to help us make it better - after all, this is for you and your Pet!!!



Our Heroes!

There are many organizations around the world that provide help & assistance  to the animal community.  At Pages4Pets we intend to embrace these groups and do all we can to help them succeed.  These groups will be urged to signup and use the features available to them within a consolidated Pet website such as Pages4Pets. These features can be used to expand a groups' reach into the community and enhance the good works they pursue.  From our Lost & Found service to promoting those organizations projects, goals and needs, our intention is to unite Our Heroes with the animal community at large.
Donation links to these accredited organizations will be supported on our website. Go to their page under Our Heroes and you can donate directly to them - and every $$$ you donate to them - stays with them!


How do I sign up for a pages4pets.com account?


Pages4Pets is FREE to join and use!  You can create Pet-Pages for each of the Pets in your family.  Pages4Pets is ad supported, with tasteful ads from partners who understand our focus on Pets, and who have products that will appeal to the Pages4Pets community.   


The basic site requires a simple user account to be created.  This process requires only the basic information seen in any account creation.  Once a user creates a Pages4Pets account, they can browse any Pet Pages on the site that are marked as public.  Page creators will also have the option of making their Pet Pages private, which will include a password which can be shared with others by the page creator. 

Once the user account has been created, you can create your own Pet-Pages.  Creating a Pet-Page presents the opportunity to enter information about your Pet, including photos, videos, comments and awards etc and can be assigned to the Circle of Life based on the date the event occurred.

  

Pet-Page Creation:  What Does It Take?

To create a Pet-Page, you will be directed to an online wizard that will ask you a number of questions about the Pet who is the subject of this Pet-Page.  Most of this information is optional but we urge you to share as much as you can to enhance the entire experience.  Some typical information would be:
  • Pet's name?
  • Type of Pet?
  • When did your Pet adopt you?
  • Category of Pet  (from categories)
  • What is your Pet's birthday (if Known)
  • What breed is your pet (Mutt/Purebred/Don't Know/Don't Care)
  • Are there any links to articles or mentions of your pet that you would like to share?
  • Was your Pet ever trained for special duty, such as a service, police or military companion?
  • Was your Pet a rescue?  If so, from Where?
  • Was your Pet purchased?  If so, from Where?
  • Do you want to keep a daily blog about your Pet?
  • Would you like to upload photos and video to your Pet-Page?
  • Would you like to include these pictures or videos on your Pet's Circle of Life?
  • Do you want your Pet-Page to be Public or Private? (enter password if private)

  • Does your Pet have any special skills you would like to mention on their Pet-Page?



A special thought as we get older...

As we grow older  and retirement looms, a special void called loneliness often appears in our life.  Kids have moved on and we are often retired from our jobs leaving little in our everyday life.  
When this happens, we sometimes lack for even the simplest companionship! This void can often be filled by that special Pet, who can provide  companionship and comfort in our later years.  
Pets can be wonderful friends and we should not forget the comfort and enjoyment they can bring to us in the later years of our lives.  It's not that they supplant our human family experiences.  Rather, they are a bonus in the aging process and become our constant companions, often dedicating their entire lives to making us happy. 
We intend to support this special bond at Pages4Pets and encourage our senior community to post pictures, comments and tributes to your Pets, who work so hard to keep you happy in the later stages of our lives. 



In-Remembrance:  A Lasting Tribute to our Pets! 

Unfortunately, time has a way of fading our memories - happens to even the best of us...  Because Pets often have a much shorter lifespan than humans, we are faced with the tragic loss of our Pets more often, and it can become difficult to keep the memory of those Pets fresh in our mind.  Pages 4Pets intends to support a special section of the site called In-Remembrance.  Community members can post Pet-Pages for the Pets they have loved and lost - Pet-Pages that are just like those for our living Pets but honored with an RIP symbol.  We also support an RIP link on the profiles of your existing Pets. In the event your Pet passes on, the existing Pet-Page can be moved to the RIP section of the site and other members of the community with whom you are connected can be notified of your loss.



Our Funding Effort:

  • Initial funding has been provided by the site's founders
  • Indiegogo Crowdfunding  campaign launches in April
  • Ongoing funding for the site will be ad supported
  • Primary ad participation from pet industry companies
  • Site is free to join and free to post  Pet-Pages
  • Direct donation links to qualified charitable Pet organizations such as adoption shelters, clinics etc will be supported 


Our Perks!

Our Perks in this campaign are offered to help us complete the construction, launch and marketing of our fully working Pages4Pets website:
We hope you will join Pages4Pets and be an active member of our community.  We want the website to be someplace that our community can have fun, meet new Pet-minded people and show off the Pets we are so proud of.  You will also be honored with a notation in our "Indiegogo Wall of Fame":  The website will contain a special link that is dedicated to the loyal Indiegogo contributors who have contributed to our campaign and are responsible for making it a success.

Some Perks offer one or more of the Pages4Pets community tags which can be worn by your Pet.  This shows that your Pet is a charter member of our community by displaying this logoed tag on your Pet's collar, leash or cage.  Let others in the Pet community know that you are involved and taking part in using Pages4Pets to create a social media experience for your Pet.  These tags are a great way of recognizing and interacting with other members of the Pages4Pets family.  

Other Perks offer protection against Identity theft and hacking, which has reached epidemic proportions around the world.  For some years the Credit Card Industry has been moving toward a change in the method used to store card information and personal data on credit cards.  The old magnetic stripe that has been a staple of identification information for many years, had simply outgrown its usefulness and is very vulnerable to being compromised. The new technology implemented was embedding an  radio frequency ID tag (RFID) enabled chip into the card, as a replacement for the mag stripe.  The logoed aluminum wallet we are offering  shields your chipped card and defeats the scanning devices used by the hackers. (Color may vary based on availability)



Growing our Ground Game! 

If politics has shown us anything, it is that every campaign needs a good ground game in order to be successful.  By that, we mean the local community getting together and making others aware of the benefits of backing a good cause like Pages4Pets.  We encourage our community members to become Grassroots organizers, who will reach out to others in their area to promote the benefits that Pages4Pets offers to the Pet community.  We need your help in connecting with as many Pet families as we can and appreciate all the effort you are making!  
Stay tuned after Pages4Pets launches to see our line of logoed apparel and accessories.  These will show the world that you are a supporter of our Pet community!


Visit Us on Social Media!

Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/pages4pets

Twitter:  https://twitter.com/Pages4Pets   @pages4pets

Instagram:  instagram.com/pages4pets

YouTube:  https://youtu.be/l28MP39BHoo
Pages4Pets:  pages4pets.com


Risks & Challenges

As with any venture, risks and challenges are always a part of the landscape.  We believe that our experience and dedication to what we are doing helps us to minimize those risks.  

We understand the challenges we face and are dedicated to bringing Pet specific social media to the community.


Other Ways You Can Help

We realize that some people simply can't afford to contribute to our campaign.  But that doesn't mean you can't be part of the solution!  Help us promote our campaign and the Pages4Pets service through word-of-mouth, and by asking others to visit our website at www.pages4pets.com to make others are aware of the good we can do in serving the Pet community.

Thanks in advance for your help and support.  Pets around the world appreciate your help in making them "Social Media Stars".

Our Perks in this campaign are offered to help us complete the construction, launch and marketing of our fully working Pages4Pets website:

We hope you will join Pages4Pets and be an active member of our community.  We want the website to be someplace that our community can have fun, meet new Pet-minded people and show off the Pets we are so proud of.  You will also be honored with a notation in our "Indiegogo Wall of Fame":  The website will contain a special link that is dedicated to the loyal Indiegogo contributors who have contributed to our campaign and are responsible for making it a success.





Some Perks offer one or more of the Pages4Pets community tags which can be worn by your Pet.  This shows that your Pet is a charter member of our community by displaying this logoed tag on your Pet's collar, leash or cage.  Let others in the Pet community know that you are involved and taking part in using Pages4Pets to create a social media experience for your Pet.  These tags are a great way of recognizing and interacting with other members of the Pages4Pets family.  


Other Perks offer protection against Identity theft and hacking, which has reached epidemic proportions around the world.  For some years the Credit Card Industry has been moving toward a change in the method used to store card information and personal data on credit cards.  The old magnetic stripe that has been a staple of identification information for many years, had simply outgrown its usefulness and is very vulnerable to being compromised. The new technology implemented was embedding an  radio frequency ID tag (RFID) enabled chip into the card, as a replacement for the mag stripe.  The logoed aluminum wallet we are offering  shields your chipped card and defeats the scanning devices used by the hackers. (Color may vary based on availability)


Growing our Ground Game! 

If politics has shown us anything, it is that every campaign needs a good ground game in order to be successful.  By that, we mean the local community getting together and making others aware of the benefits of backing a good cause like Pages4Pets.  We encourage our community members to become Grassroots organizers, who will reach out to others in their area to promote the benefits that Pages4Pets offers to the Pet community.  We need your help in connecting with as many Pet families as we can and appreciate all the effort you are making!  


Stay tuned after Pages4Pets launches to see our line of logoed apparel and accessories.  These will show the world that you are a supporter of our Pet community!



Visit Us on Social Media!

Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/pages4pets
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/Pages4Pets   @pages4pets
Instagram:  instagram.com/pages4pets
YouTube:  https://youtu.be/l28MP39BHoo
Pages4Pets:  pages4pets.com



Risks & Challenges
 

As with any venture, risks and challenges are always a part of the landscape.  We believe that our experience and dedication to what we are doing helps us to minimize those risks.  
We understand the challenges we face and are dedicated to bringing Pet specific social media to the community.   
Other Ways You Can Help 

We realize that some people simply can't afford to contribute to our campaign.  But that doesn't mean you can't be part of the solution!  Help us promote our campaign and the Pages4Pets service through word-of-mouth, and by asking others to visit our website at www.pages4pets.com to make others are aware of the good we can do in serving the Pet community.
Thanks in advance for your help and support.  Pets around the world appreciate your help in making them "Social Media Stars".

story:
The World's First Personality Coach

Have you ever wished you were more level-headed, more focused, or more confident? While such personality changes may seem impossible, researchers at the University of Nottingham have discovered that motivated people can change their personality in just a few days with the help of a digital coach. Based on this evidence, the research team has developed TraitMap, the world's first Personality Coach. A fully-automated device that can detect health-damaging character traits that hold you back – and deliver personalized trait-lifting activities to help you reach your full potential.

What is TraitMap's design method?
TraitMap applies a game design strategy that requires you follow one simple rule: “to exercise a personality trait outside your comfort zone at least once a day”. For example, to become more extraverted, one trait-boosting challenge asks that you pretend you’re comfortable in social situations by starting a conversation with a stranger. In other words, “fake it till you make it.” New thought and behaviour patterns create new brain pathways the more you exercise traits outside your comfort zone. In short, changing your personality.

What are the goals of TraitMap?

    a) To raise your awareness of how bad traits control and restrict your life
    b) To transform restrictive personality traits into ones that empower you
    c) To avoid perfection and permit failure – it’s part of the game!
    d) To take pleasure and learn from each TraitMap challenge
The secret to TraitMap's success is its unique 5-step gameplay:
  • Trait-coaching "modules" inform you of optimal trait goals
  • Trait-tracking "goals" raise awareness of your positive changes over time
  • Trait-lifting “challenges” turn bad traits into ones that empower you
  • Trait-gifting "rewards" keep you motivated to stay on track
  • Trait-sharing “stories" help others toward positive change

The responsiveness of TraitMap is the result of our ETHOS™ Technology which combines a novel algorithm with data feedback from five sensors – microphone, accelerometer, motion sensor, touch display, and video camera. Passively detecting personality traits that hold you back – and delivering tailored activities in order to change and grow them. Resulting in positive life improvements that stabilize over the long-term.

How Does TraitMap Work?

Frequently Asked Questions

Who developed TraitMap?

TraitMap is the result of a global initiative, with resource support from the Division of Rehabilitation and Ageing at the University of Nottingham (UK) and the National Institute of Health Innovation (NIHI) at the University of Auckland (NZ).

How is TraitMap funded?

TraitMap relies on a wide range of funding channels, including community support donations, pro bono services between the Universities of Nottingham and Auckland, and individual philanthropic donors. As preliminary data has become available on the effectiveness of TraitMap, the team has decided to seek additional funding from public and private sources.

What type of smartphones do TraitMap support?

TraitMap is compatible with all smartphones running a BLE-enabled Android or iOS operating system.

What is the scientific evidence behind TraitMap?

Evidence shows that bad habits are determined by key traits and that these traits can be reversed by targeted gaming interventions.These studies have found that motivated people can not only change their personality within weeks of starting an intervention but that their trait changes remain stable after several months.

What qualifies as a TraitMap success?

You succeed when you are no longer a slave to your traits vulnerabilities. Of course you’ll feel vulnerable during a trait-boosting challenge as it will be out of your comfort zone. But you’ll break through feeling vulnerable and do the exercise anyway. You will know for yourself that trait-boosting is not a devastating event to be totally shunned at all costs but the mother of your future success. It is only your fear of failing that has hidden this ultimate truth from you.

Find out what counts as a success.

What qualifies as a TraitMap failure?

You do absolutely nothing, and continue living your current life.

What should I do if I can’t/don’t want to do a trait-boosting challenge?

Each daily trait-boosting challenge is a hint. Attempt it in whatever context you are currently in (making sure the exercise is out of your comfort zone) and make it happen. Don’t forget, when you attempt the trait-boosting challenge it’s important to work the exercise as much as you can because it means you courageously availed yourself to new opportunities. Failure is just part of the game too.

Is it good for me to encourage others to share the experience?

Yes. The Law of Attraction states that by focusing on positive or negative thoughts you bring positive or negative experiences into your life. Encouraging trait-boosting in others means you're helping them transform into the best they can be. Just remember to treat everyone with kindness and respect

How is my information kept safe?

Project investigators make it their priority to protect the rights of all participants to privacy and informed consent. To this end, they  adhere to the Data Protection Act, 1998. Data from the design evaluation and trial will be stored on a secure dedicated web server and password protected by encryption software.


The Research Team

TraitMap was founded in November 2015 by medical researcher Grant Munro at the Institute of Health Innovation (NIHI). TraitMap is a collaborative effort between medical research teams from the University of Nottingham UK and the University of Auckland, NZ who are passionate about developing innovative mobile technologies to enable people to get the most from life. The core team of dedicated researchers and doctors include:

Grant Munro | Creative Director, design expert with 25 years experience developing design solutions for some of the world's most recognised brands.
George Filippakos | Software Developer, web design expert with 15 years experience developing world-leading social networking sites.
Dr Neil Coulson | Primary Supervisor, international expert and publisher in the world of peer-to-peer online support communities.
Dr Robyn Whittaker | Supervisor, public health physician and international expert on mobile health, consulting to the World Health Organisation, International Telecommunications Union, U.S. Dept of Health & Human Services.
Dr Chris Bullen | Supervisor, public health physician with expertise on clinical trials in innovative health technologies to support smoking cessation.

Perks Available

Donate now and become a key player in the core beta testing community and receive free software updates of all future iterations of TraitMap! See a full list of benefits packages on our Perks page.

If you are not in a position to donate, you may like to:

  • Share our campaign with your friends on other social networking sites
  • Join our emailing list to stay in touch with future developments
The Impact

One of the most promising and cost-effective ways to achieve positive health changes is by using mobile apps via smartphone or tablet devices. Despite the recent proliferation, few health apps have been tailored to the unique health needs individuals, and more specifically key populations – e.g., people who use drugs (PWUD), men who have sex with men (MSM), transgender persons, and sex workers. Key populations are of greatest concern because they are disproportionately vulnerable to HIV infection, mental illness, and addiction as a result of psychosocial stressors related to stigma and discrimination.

With your help, we can begin to unravel the multifaceted ways in which our unique personalities can influence positive health outcomes. TraitMap is one small step in developing positive health changes and life outcomes. One step that we hope will help establish a useful point of departure for future research projects into personalised health apps. Indeed, the contribution of TraitMap is likely to be significant, as the project:

  • enables streamlined informed consent, prompt continued user participation, and collect infinitely richer data sets
  • reflects a paradigm shift and recent calls for personalisation to help clinicians diagnose and treat mental illness
  • helps foster a deeper understand of how critical changes in personality can impact recovery outcomes
  • helps developers identify the responsive app determinants most likely to elicit key trait and behavioural changes

Potential Challenges

Data Reliability: Concerns about the reliability of data collected through TraitMap are likely to arise during beta testing. Specifically, issues related to selection and participation bias as well as various degrees of participation and user engagement.

Ethical and Privacy: Our developers must ensure that the beta testing volunteers fully understand the scope of the clinical trial, namely its primary objective to use trial data to improve future functionality and user experience of TraitMap.

story:
We offer a valuable service to electricity consumers for free

Allazorevma.gr is the first electricity price comparison website in Greece. The consumer can easily find out which provider better suits his/her needs, make an informed decision, and switch through an online user-friendly interface.

                  

We know what we're talking about and we are independent

We are Clarus ESCo, an energy services company that has been operating in the energy efficiency and renewable resources fields since 2010. We are also electricity experts and we developed allazorevma.gr as a way of sharing our expertise with the public. We believe we are enablers of change in the retail electricity market that is beginning to show the first signs of healthy competition in our country.

                                   

 

        Allazorevma.gr can act as catalyst and make a big difference

Allazorevma.gr saves consumers a substantial amount of time spent in searching and comparing offers and helps them achieve significant reductions in electricity expense. We calculate that, if half of the incumbent's customers (who dominates the market with 95% market share) switched to an alternative provider, the combined savings would reach an estimated 150 million euros.                  

                                

        We ask for money so we can keep offering the service for free

We offer this service free of charge to the public. Therefore, we need alternative sources of  income to cover the cost. These sources depend on the traffic generated by the website. This is why we appeal to you. We expect that 70 % of the 5.000 euros that we are asking for will be used to purchase publicity though the internet and conventional media. The other 30% we plan to spend on the development of new functionality for allazorevma.gr, such as the inclusion of customer evaluation features, natural gas provider price comparison (when that becomes an option) etc. We promise that full disclosure regarding the amount spent on each of these objectives will be available on our website for all our donors to peruse.

                                

              What's in it for you - apart from supporting a good cause?

If you decide to support us, we have a range of available gifts to show our appreciation.

-All our contributors get a "we are grateful" email, and an acknowledgement on our website. More importantly, they become privileged customers. They have first priority to receive energy advice from our experts over the phone. They will also receive early notification about any future offers implemented by allazorevma.gr, such as refunds when a user switches through our website.

-If you contribute 10 euros, we'll return it to you when you switch through allazorevma.gr

-If you contribute 20 euros, you get one LED lamp for your home. LED lighting is the cheapest and most efficient lighting technology, that saves you up to 80% of your electricity consumption.

-If you contribute 35 euros, you get two LED lamps.

-If you contribute 70 euros, you get four LED lamps.

-If you contribute 100 euros, you can buy an energy monitor for 60 euros (original cost 100 euros). The energy monitor is a device that helps you keep track of your electricity consumption through a dedicated online application. You can check which appliances consume the most energy and adjust your household habits to maximize energy efficiency.

-If you contribute 200 euros, you get a 60 euro discount voucher for smart home products, that let you monitor and control your electricity expenditure. These clever gadgets include remotely controlled power outlets and an electricity monitoring station.

-If you contribute 300 euros, you automatically become a major allazorevma.gr sponsor. You can see your name or company logo at a prominent place on our website.

(Note: all the perks, except for the last one, only ship to Greece. Nevertheless, donors who contribute from abroad can nominate a Greek resident as recipient of their gift.) 

                                                     

                                   Short on cash? You can still help

If you can't contribute right now, there are other ways you can help. Spread the word about our campaign and allazorevma.gr, let people know what we do and how they can take advantage of our service. Everyone can benefit from this.

story:
Our Story

Kopa Leo is a peer lending business operating virtually through an App on Android store making  invitation to people who need to borrow and others to lend. Our aim was to match borrowing needs of our clients with available financial resources invested by Grand peers with us. 

The idea was born out of the conventional lending practices where clientelle  visit a shop or a grocery store and request for credit terms. As opposed to the conventional method of Credit terms where the clients receive the goods, a record is made on a book and the proprietor waits for the client to pay on an agreed date, Kopa leo started offering small loans to its clients, who would eventually make their intended purchases from its own shop outlet and possibly also make other purchases elsewhere with the change.

This lending model was very successful since it neither limited clients to making purchases from Kopa leo outlet nor make purchases for the goods we stock alone.

Most of our borrowing requests are to cover basic necessities like food, clothing, shelter, education and medical needs.


How it Works

  1. Visit Google Play store


2.Download "Kopa Leo" App

3.  Install and Open "Kopa Leo" App

4.Visit our pages eg "Borrow Today"  and post your request

The Process.



How you Can Help

We have a shortage of Grand peers to match borrowing requests which we are receiving to about USD 70000 per month.

We target to lend slightly above 10% of all requests.

We therefore request your lending hand and help us raise USD 10000 for this purpose. You can also help by spreading word about us to other peers.
